mataṅnyan mantrastambhana ya pamanah kṛṣṇa vəkasan

tumampuh riṅ śrī dharmatanaya tumuntən kahənəṅan

gupe tan molah mogha təka malupāṅ aṅga məgəgəh

mənəṅ lvir tan pātmâmrih aṅadəg apā tan vruh iṅ ulah



Canto 39

I.

ata ri səḍəṅ yudhiṣṭhira kənêṅ prayoga rapu mepu tan vənaṅ amūk

humənəṅ ayoga ta pva vəkasan mahā həniṅ ikaṅ manah pinahayu

valuyanikaṅ prajā pagəhaniṅ vikāra sinamādhi tan hana vaneh

turunan i sih bhaṭāra juga kāraṇanya muvahê titah ika daṅū


II.

pravara dhanañjayâta sira maṅkin ujvala galaknirârdha kumucup

ahiḍəpa tan pariṅtusa narendra kṛṣṇa lumagāna dharmatanaya

karaṇaniran təkâmanahakən śilādri gumuruh riṅ ambaratala

məjahana saṅ vatək yadu viśīrṇa həntya saha vāhananya rəmukən


III.

narapati kṛṣṇa yatna lumihat mahābhaya hiḍəpnirâdbhuta dahat

pinapagirêṅ śarânupama hīrabajra sagunuṅ sateja lumarap

səḍəṅ apagut riṅ ambara rəmək rəmuk ta ya larut mələk dadi ləbu

bala parivāra denya kapəgan paḍâmrih alayū duduṅ mati kavəs


IV.

akəḍik ikaṅ vənaṅ mulati denirâpraṅ atakut dumeh giri-giriṅ

ṛṣigaṇa riṅ nabhastala jugâtri ghūrṇita maṅadvakən vija-vijah

tucapa ta ki mpu nārada cumaṅka-caṅka marək āmahâṅgutu-gutuk

kahala tinəmpuh iṅ ḍaḍali mə̄r kagəm salah-iḍəp valiṅnya varayaṅ



Canto 40

I.

maṅkin gə̄ṅ krodha saṅ pārtha kapanasan i tan pamvas iṅ hrū śilādri

hetunyân svāpanāstrâta pinasaṅira rep siddhi sampun minantran

mūrcha lolyâharip saṅ yadukula maturū mohitā tan panon rāt

āpan deniṅ pətəṅ kātara təka sumaput lvir laṅit rug sahabnya


II.

tan dva śrī kṛṣṇa meh-meh kakavaśa vəkasan yatna mamrih sudhīra

hrū candrâditya tejomaya pamapag iraṅ svāpanāstrândhakāra

tap byar ndā-ndā hilaṅ taṅ pətəṅ avuṅu ta saṅ śūra kapvâṅhruk asraṅ

hyun-hyun darpâṅrəgəp sañjata mari kabharan garjitâṅuṇḍa khaḍga


III.

saṅ pārtha krodha yekân muvah amanahakən hrū bhujārvāsuvāṇḍa

sār sə̄k lumrâvilət rodra muni makakakan bhīṣaṇa krūrarūpa

sakveh saṅ vrṣṇivīrâlayat aluru lume kāpusan nāgapāśa

tan dhairyâṅuṅgut-uṅgut kapati kapanasan səmbu-səmbur viṣāgni


IV.

tambis həntyâradin saṅ yadukula hinələ̄ denikaṅ nāgarāja

yatna śrī kṛṣṇa hetunya pinapagira riṅ venateyāstra śakti

sek lar ṅheṅ lavaṅ taṅ garuḍa maṅan ikaṅ sarpa sakvehnya hənti

lvir veniṅ sāgara bhraṣṭa sakəḍap ininum denira hyaṅ agastya


V.

saṅ pārthâṅhəṭṭahāsâdbhuta ri hilaṅ ikaṅ nāga tan pāvak āśā

yekân saṅhārakālāntaka riṅəgəpira hrū makāvak śivāgni

lumrā muntab dudug riṅ akaśa ṅarab-arab lvir huməntyākənaṅ rāt

āpan hamham ri tan lotnyan alavas alapā prāṇaniṅ śatru śakti


VI.

ndā tan dva bhraṣṭa sakveh yadukula ṅuniveh saṅ vatək vrṣṇi śīrṇa

kagyat śrī kṛṣṇa sep tan vruh iṅ ulah apijər kasrəpan mar ikaṅ tvas

maṅkin pvāṅ bahni mumbul biṣama hilaṅ ikaṅ bhur bhuvah svah təkapnya

saṅ hyaṅ riṅ svargalokâṅhili makabarasat kāladan meh katuṅvaṅ


VII.

hetunyan mogha sambartakayaśa pamanah kṛṣṇa riṅ hrū viṣâgni

rār rəp ghor kumva taṅ nīrada təka sumaput sinyaṅ iṅ gəntər asrak

sumyuk taṅ varṣa tan pāntara duməmak ikaṅ bahni rug tan pasāra

trāsâṅdadyan kukus lvīr amalaku hinurip gadgadâṅhambək-ambək


VIII.

nistanyan syuhnikaṅ agni tan ari kumutug krodha saṅ pārtha muntab

vahvâmet hrū muvah sep kahala riṅuhunan margaṇâdrəs ya śakti

puṅgəl têkaṅ laras syuh saha kavaca rukuh taṅkulak śīrṇa kontal

tañjrih maṅkin tumandaṅ siran aṅivuṅ amūk sāhasâṅraṅkulâmrəp


IX.

kagyat śrī kṛṣṇa tuvy ahyun amanaha muvah dug mayat sep tinəmpuh

siṅsal ta hrūnira mvaṅ larasira kahalā nirvva tan paprayoga

ndātan dvâprəp silih daṇḍa ta sira vəkasan lot araṅkit silih kol

lagy âvantah silih-bandha sira paḍa silih jamba rodrā silih tur


X.

ṅkān gəṅgə̄ṅən sirê gə̄ṅni galakira paḍâvətva-vətvan kaśaktin

eṅət yan devamūrti gatinira kəta nārāyaṇâṅśa prasiddha

ndā-ndā kapvâsalin rūpa ta sira tumuluy vaspadâvaknira hyaṅ

śobha lvirniṅ taṅan pat humaləp irisirā mvaṅ liriṅniṅ triṅetra


XI.

ndan tuṅgal tattva saṅ hyaṅ mapadəgan aharəp mapraṅâpattrayuddha

məṅgəp rvâbheda viṣṇvātmaka ta sira mahā bheda rîcchā bhaṭāra

vyartha pvā mapraṅa ndah ya ta karaṇanirañ jāti viṣṇvāvatāra

līlā muṅgv iṅ mahāpadma rəṣigaṇa marək mvaṅ catur lokapāla



Canto 41

I.

ri səḍəṅiran katon aṅavatāra bhaṭāra hari

sumurup ikaṅ divaṅkara vulan mətu konaṅ-unaṅ

sumuluh i rāmyaniṅ raṇasabhā mari kātatakut

maṇimaya sarva bhāsvara jugaṅ daśadeṡa kabeh


II.

nṛpati yudhiṣṭhirârarəm aṅarcaṇa supranata

humarəpakən bhaṭāra hari yatna marək tan adoh

saha japa kūṭamantra ginəlar savarahniṅ aji

stutinira varṇanən sphuṭa manohara têki rəṅən



Canto 42

I.

oṃ indah ta bhaṭāra nātha madhusūdana lihatana səmbah i ṅhulun

saṅ hyaṅniṅ hyaṅ anindya sāriṅiṅ acintya kita paramatattva durlabha

nistantân atisūkṣma mogha təka riṅ jənək amahayu yoga sasmṛti

lvir māyā kita tan katon ri hənəṅ iṅ hənəṅ anəvasakən varādhika


II.

andəlniṅ caduśakti len hananiṅ aṣṭaguṇa ya karaṇanta durgama

evəh vastvana sarvamūrti kita sarvagata humibək iṅ jagattraya

brahmā viṣṇu maheśvara ndin apalenana kita tuvin eka pūrvaka

kvehniṅ giṇa lavan kriā pva mavibhājya ta kita dadi saptasāgara


III.

yan riṅ sṛṣṭi kitê səḍaṅta magave jagat irika kitan pitāmahā

tatkālanta mivə triloka pinakāśraya karaṇa kitan janārdhana

saṅhāra pva təkaṅ mahāpralaya rudra kita guməsəṅîrikaṅ sarāt

icchāntân paśarīra bheda paramārtha kita sasiki yan sadāśiva


IV.

kvehniṅ bhikṣukapakṣa śeva rəṣi sogata paḍa maṅucap tapabrata

lāvan tattva mabheda śāstra ri pasaṅgraha cumacad i pakṣaniṅ para

ndan vruh yan kita kāraṇanya kita saṅkanika paranahanya tan vaneh

paṅliṅgan hana sarvapakṣa humiḍəp kita sakalajagat yayan ləpas



Canto 43

I.

tapvan ratāniki hikaṅ stuti de narendra

saṅ hyaṅ hupendra karəṇan sumahur saharṣa

oṃ vruh ṅhulun prabhu ri maṅgəh ikiṅ kabhaktin

pintāṅ anugraha təkāna sakahyunanta


II.

yan vīrya kāpti naranātha jaya kitêṅ rāt

yan śaktya dibya vənaṅâṅrurahêṅ triloka

yan svarga tovi kaharəpta yadin kamokṣan

tan dadya mithya sakatən katəmunta nātha



Canto 44

I.

maṅkana liṅnira saṅ hyaṅ anantva

yatna narendra yudhiṣṭhira mojar

dū tan ikā ta paveha bhaṭāra

ṅhiṅ palakun valuyâpagəhaṅ rāt


II.

tan hana matya ṅaranya rikiṅ praṅ

vehana jīva paḍâhuripâtah

sihta nimittanikin hana ṅūni

tan tulusa pva ya sis lalu heman


III.

nāhan ujar nṛpa dharmasutârūm

tan pasahur ta bhaṭāra viraṅrvaṅ

āpan apakrama kārya narārya

ndin hana māti muvah paripūrṇa


IV.

ndan sira saṅ surasaṅghya paḍâsvī

kapva yumuktyani śabda narendra

sājña bhaṭāra kənoh maluyan rāt

tan samayanya matêki viśīrṇa


V.

tovi turuṅ panuluṅta vatək hyaṅ

donta yan aṅdadi mānuṣajāti

rākśasa bhoma huripnya sinādhya

doṣanikâsriṅ amāvala kendran


VI.

yogya gatinya katoliha denta

toh maluya pva śarīra bhaṭāra

kṛṣṇa-dhanañjayarūpa katona

ndah tulusākəna rakṣanikeṅ rāt


VII.

ndī ripu śakti duməlva kitêṅ rāt

sih samusuhta marêka paratra

tonən ikaṅ madhu-kīṭabha tovi

syuh tinəpakta ri kālaniṅ aprəp


VIII.

maṅkana ṅūni kitaṅ narasiṅha

daitya hiraṇya pəjah tinukunta

len atəmah kita brāhmaṇa vipra

ṅkân dumədəl sirah iṅ balirāja


IX.

mvaṅ ri səḍaṅta mahâṅdadi rāma

rāvaṇa kādbhuta māti təkapta

bhoma musuhta səḍaṅ jaya maṅke

tan pəjaha pva ya bhagna yaśanta


X.

hīṅan ike pituhunta narārya

yan muvahâhuripêki saṅ apraṅ

don ika yogya dəlāha sahāya

paṅrurahan narakāsura riṅ praṅ



Canto 45

See Zoetmulder, Kalangwan, p. 466
I.

nahan rasani paṅhyaṅ iṅ hyaṅ i bhaṭāra ri valuyanikaṅ prajāhita

saharṣa sumahur sirânaku sabhāgya kitan apitutur satorasi

kənoh valuyani ṅhulun tuvin ikiṅ pəjah ahuripa hayva saṅśaya

katuhvan aku meh pramāda kita tan pasuruhan i karakṣan iṅ jagat


II.

kunaṅ pva karaṇaṅkun epu humənəṅ sakarəṅ i paṅucap yudhiṣṭhira

liṅanta tinahā sumaṅguh aṅapakrama yan ahuripaṅ huvus pəjah

prayojananikā paḍôbhaya ri tiṅkah iki valuya pūrṇa sāsvata

apan mati tan antakanya ya tuhun səḍəṅ inavaraniṅ kavikraman


III.

sanugraha bhaṭāra maṅkana sumāntva mapalakuṅ asih vatək rəṣi

ayoga ta sirâgəlar japa samādhi katutur i katattvan iṅ dadi

sinimpənan i tan dudunya ri śarīranira hala-hayunya kavruhan

apan sira vidhāyakêriya sadharma hana mətu sakê manahnira


IV.

hənaṅnira samaṅkanâmupulakən ghana sumaput atap riṅ ambara

guməntər aṅuhuh gərəhnya humuṅ asrak asarag agalar-galar kilat

ndatan dva ḍumavuh turun ya hudan āmṛta vavaṅ abaṅun tikaṅ praja

təkêṅ mṛga pipīlikā kahava ṅūni kadi gila-gilâhurip muvah


V.

samaṅkana haləpnikaṅ raṇasabhâparimita kadi ṅūni pūrvaka

apan sahana saṅ vatək ratu təkêṅ bala gaja ratha pūrṇa tan hilaṅ

tuhun mara mapakṣa mapraṅa paḍâpisaṅ adulur atūt yathāsukha

apan paramagarjitā manah i harṣa jati nikin anugrahiṅurip


VI.

prayatna karavīranātha pinakādi para ratu marək ri jə̄ṅ aji

anambah aṅupakṣamârarəm aṅarcaṇa saha japasaṇḍi sakrama

rikân vinuvusaṅ manohara sabhāgya ta narapatin atvaṅ i ṅhulun

niroga nirupadravâstu kita maṅgihakəna phalaniṅ kadigjayan


VII.

kunaṅ pva satatâmrihâgavaya dharma kita pahayu nitya rakṣaka

ataṅgvana parārtha len upaśamâtvaṅa ri sahananiṅ pinaṇḍita

vruhêṅ aguṇa tan jigimva tuvi tan vava rəṅəha ri doṣaniṅ vaneh

yayā vənaṅa sārabhūta makatoha pati kita ri hayvaniṅ praja


VIII.

pabhakti ri bhaṭāra dharma mara maṅkana tuhu-tuhu tanpa niṣphala

pañihnana kitâhurip muvah anugrahanira ta gatinya tan vaneh

ndya tâvakira yan kva līṅa lihatiki sira makaṅaraṅ yudhiṣṭhira

sirêki paramārthaśaṅkara maveh sukha gatinira yogya səmbahən


IX.

apan viphala gə̄ṅ nikuṅ guṇa vənaṅ mara makahulunaṅ jagattraya

hilaṅ təkap i kuṅ kamūrkhan i hatinta mada kuhaka māna garvita

kunaṅ pva paṅəmit yudhiṣṭhira riṅ ambək upaśarma parārtha mārdava

ikâmaluyakən huripta ya mataṅnya tikaṅ kasattvikan


X.

lavan pituhu rakva hayva kita vādaka ri gatinikaṅ si rukmiṇī

apan təmah i ghāriṅi ṅhulun ikânuturakəna gatiṅku mānuṣa

ndi tan vənaṅa lena karma niki bheda saka ri vasudevanandana

apan tuhu-tuhu ṅhulun pva manarīra ri sira ya mataṅnya lakyakən


XI.

huvus pavarahaṅkva mantuka ta saṅ prabhu lumarisa hayva saṅśaya

ṅhulun muvaha kṛṣṇa-pārtha maluyânulusakəna karakṣan iṅ jagat

tan adva paṅucap bhaṭāra puruṣottama tumulus arūpa mānuṣa

surāpsara rikā kṣaṇâlilaṅ asambhava kadi siluman samaṅkana



Canto 46

See Zoetmulder, Kalangwan, p. 455
I.

kāla śrī kṛṣṇa yañ jāti śarīra

lāvan saṅ pārtha sāmpun mavibhāga

rāmyâpaṅguh lavan vāndhava mitra

embəh gəṅniṅ sukhâpañ jayaśatru


II.

yatnânambah muvah saṅ nṛpasaṅghya

ṅkanê dharmātmaja mvaṅ harivaṅśa

saṅṣiptā rātri luṅhā sakamantyan

lvir trāsârəs tumonaṅ raviraśmi


III.

tiṅhal śrī kṛṣṇa riṅ rāt paripūrṇa

marmâṅde garjitê tvasnira tībra

tovin bhaktin sira kṣatriyavīrya

tan vaṅ mātrāntan abuddhya kaṭuṅka


IV.

maṅkin pvâmbəknirâparchaya riṅ tvas

ṅkân pamvit mantukê saṅ nṛpasaṅghya

ndan saṅ vinvit paḍârakṣa kabhaktin

kapvâhyun milva nityâṅhiriṅâtah


V.

sampun pvâtūt ikaṅ śabda yinuktyan

yekan maṅkat parəṅ tan hana kantun

rāmyâtiṅkah kadîṅ pūrvaka ṅūni

śobha kapvêniriṅniṅ bhaṭamantri


VI.

byātītan kāduk iṅ mārga narendra

strī ṅkānê rājya gantyākəna varṇan

tan ryamban glāna śīrṇa hati rəñcəm

ləṅləṅ mūrchan rəṅə̄ vṛtta saṅ apraṅ


VII.

akveh strī pakṣa matyan dug adandan

āpan saṅ svāmi kājar pəjah iṅ praṅ

ṅkân pamvit maṅkatā mitra karīha

luṅhâmet taṅ sənəṅ riṅ raṇabhūmi


VIII.

rəṅrəṅ śokaṅ varastrī rəməṅ i tvas

vvah kiṇkiṇ rob kəbək riṅ lara tībra

ri drəsniṅ varṣa vāṣpan paṅasaptan

nityâgəntər taṅis tan paparuṅvan


IX.

tuṅgal rvâparchayê śakti narendra

təkvan saṅ svāmi kāsihnira rakva

rikân matyâpa jantən hiḍəpənya

ṅhiṅ duhkhanyê pamāvvanya tavan strī



Canto 47

See Zoetmulder, Kalangwan, p. 465.
I.

sanagara kapva duhkhita manahnya hali-halin i patya saṅ sənəṅ

ndatan atələb dahat karika līṅa ri vənaṅ ika maṅlipur lara

anuṅ alume katīkṣṇan aṅivə̄ prihati siraṅ anāma rukmiṇī

kadi gatiniṅ tahən ragas aṅanti rarab i rərəb iṅ labuh kapat


II.

pira ta lavas narendra layat aṅlurug irika təvəknirâlaṅə̄

ahila .. ṅan turū lali nahan mahas aməṅ-aməṅ iṅ taman ləṅə̄

aguliṅan iṅ śilātala sinoṅan iṅ asana tirah nikaṅ ranu

ararab aśokapādapa panīsa hati karika maṅkin aṅlare


III.

viphala pupusnikaṅ kadali sālas ulih iṅ amibik turuṅ məkar

vinəlarakən tinap mṛdutarâpənəd araras avarṇa lir putih

pinakatilamnirêrika mapêkin amanasi təkâmaṅun huyaṅ

pilih iki manmathâlarani vādaka ri siran anorakən ratih


IV.

məhah aṅəsah sirêpu hanan aṅlilir asidəha lolya kaṅlihan

avənəs alə̄k ikaṅ mukha sumuṅkəm alihaṅan ikaṅ kaka-kaka

vətisira mar tinampa kinisapvakən inamər-amər linālana

paṅuliha rañcaniṅ hati yayā siran alupa ri sandhiniṅ tapih


V.

tuhu hana pakṣa patya sira sə̄k prih-ati milu təkêṅ rarasnira

gəluṅira tovi sampun arusak-rusakan asana jaṅga kasturi

kavəlas-arəpni luhniran agantuṅan i hiḍəp avas tibêṅ vəhaṅ

kahala rəmək patahnira tikəl halisira makasaṅśayâlulut


VI.

irika ta kesarīn pavacanâṅləbur … lara kūṅniran maṅə̄

ibu mapa hetuniṅ katahənan rimaṅ asuməṅ upək tiniṅhalan

ikuṅ unəṅ iṅ sənəṅni karin antyakəna sira dadin ḍataṅ məne

halanika yan ginə̄ṅ dahat avasnya aməjahana tan hanaṅ phala


VII.

kadi gatiniṅ vava trasamənər tuvi niyata murub ya vinvaṅan

sagunun atêki yan pinadəm iṅ kapana təhəra denya muntaba

arah iva maṅkana prih-ati tan dahata tələbakən tinūtakən

adaləma duhkhabhāra ya linīpu-lipurira havas hilaṅnika



Canto 48

I.

nā liṅyâṅamər irikân sahur suputrī

aṅhrət mār ahirit ikaṅ svarâṅrəsi tvas

nistanyân kuṅ i kita kāraṇaṅku śoka

tan sih saṅ nṛpati jugâmaṅun larêraṅ


II.

tan svaṅ hyūnira mara ṅūni liṅta tībra

ṅvaṅ tan taṅgamani vuvusta sugyan adva

ndā yêkī kaparitahā vavaṅ kapaṅgih

ndi kvānaṅkva tinida puccha tan hineman


III.

āpā yan hana nata śuddhya saṅ narendra

tan karya ṅhulun i siran marêṅ raṇāṅga

sâvasthānira tiki rāmya yan katona

mon matyâhuripa sira ndā tan saha ṅvaṅ


IV.

maṅka pvâpa taṅ anuṅ enakā gatiṅku

nityâṅgə̄ṅ prihati lanâṅəmit lara tvas

āpan yan pəjaha sira syapâśrayaṅkva

yan svasthā nṛpati katon lalisnirê ṅvaṅ


V.

aṅhiṅ têkana ləkasaṅkva matya maṅke

āpan tan hana pinalar tikiṅ tuvuhku

təkvan vṛtta saṅ ahulun huvus viśīrṇa

yâṅde lampus i manah i ṅhulun paratra


VI.

hīṅanyâhayu pəjahâku hayva t-āśā

ndiṅ heren kari yatan isyanaṅ kasatyan

liṅ devī tumuluy amuṣṭi khaḍga tīkṣṇa

ṅkân pinrih sira pinəkul taṅan ginəgvan



Canto 49

I.

ri səḍəṅirâṅagəm curiga lampus amus pəjaha

tucapa ta saṅ narādhipa ḍatəṅ sira riṅ nagara

saha bala vīra kapva mulih iṅ gṛha tan vuvusən

niyata sarāga tapva ya sinuṅsuṅ iṅ aṅlih akuṅ


II.

kunaṅ ika saṅ vatək ratu kabeh satamu nṛpati

dumunuṅ i saṅ vatək yadu linād dinadar suruhan

pinisalinan dukūla saha bhūṣaṇa ratnamaya

vəki pənuh iṅ bhinukti sukha tan hana kaprihati


III.

prabhu harimūrti mañjiṅ i dalem pura śīghratara

dumunuṅ i pamrəman pravara bhīṣmakarājasutā

cuva sira tan kapaṅgih ika saṅ kalulut nṛpati

vinarahakən hanêṅ taman amet paṅimur griṅ unaṅ


IV.

narapati kabvatan turida hetuniran tumutur

unaṅ alavas kinə̄lakənirêṅ hati marma sumək

mijil atəmah smitâvətu manisnya sumə̄ṅ ri mata

ulih-ulihêṅ rimaṅ karika suṅsuṅən iṅ dug akūṅ


V.

saḍataṅirêṅ taman kalihatan ta saṅ ogha rapuh

kaharəp apatrəmaṅ curiga tīkṣṇa murub ri taṅan

karaṇanirân təkâṅisapu mojar arūm amanis

ataña ri marmaniṅ prihati tan sah atən pəjaha


VI.

ibu lihat i ṅhulun dyah apa hetuni noran alə̄k

lulurən ikuṅ jajâmpihan i luhta lanā humilī

gəluṅ inurā kusut saha səkarnya sumār sumavur

mari kuməñar mukhanta kadi candra səḍaṅ grahana


VII.

ṅrəs i hatini ṅhulun lumihatiṅ curigârja siṅi

hinayatakənta paṅhilaṅa jīvita marma dahat

taya maluyêṅ havan pva kita riṅ vvaṅ aseva manis

tan anumatê gatiṅku kavi kasyasih iṅ kalaṅən


VIII.

puji avatāra riṅ ratih avas kita kūṅ anurun

təmahan i kiṅkiṅ i ṅvaṅ aṅaraṅ mar i kuṅ kahayun

tuhu lara rāga mūlani rarasta lanâməjahi

turida vinimba mānuṣa kitâri lulut minatan


IX.

mapa kari doṣani ṅvaṅ ibu mogha dinohan unaṅ

sipi mara yatnani ṅvaṅ i rarasta ginə̄ṅ hinivə̄

salukar ikuṅ gəluṅ pinahayuṅkv inapîṅ kusuma

yan api-calā dyah aṅhari-hari ṅhulun iṅ kakavin


X.

kathamapi tan vruhā paṅamər i ṅvaṅ i rūmta bibi

mañulu-ñuluhku kepvan anahā ri halista tikəl

ya karaṇani ṅhulun ləṅəṅ amūra marêṅ pasisi

pəjaha savet nikiṅ lara lagîṅivəhan turida



Canto 50

I.

nā liṅ narādhipa rumañca manah sudevī

ndātan sahur saṅ ahajəṅ maṅənəb raras tvas

saṅ kesarī pva vihikan ri manahnirêraṅ

marmanya sādara sumambut ujar narendra


II.

liṅnyâvuvus prabhu hade paṅucap narārya

ndin laṅghyanā sira ri sāmbəka saṅ narendra

kintu pva hetunira marma nisūkṣma mūrcha

glānâṅrəṅə̄ ri pati saṅ naranātha riṅ praṅ


III.

nāhan mataṅniran amuṣṭi varāstra tīkṣṇa

milvêṅ paratra haji liṅnira suṣṭu satya

maṅke pva saṅ nṛpati yan təka nirvikāra

sākṣāt kucup kahudanan sira sasmitârūm


IV.

ḍuh maṅkana pva kaka sis rinasan katuhvan

durnītini ṅvaṅ i siran kari tan kinuṇḍaṅ

āpan katon rəṅə-rəṅə̄nanirê gatiṅku

tambis ṅhulun kaluputan riṅ uripnirâṅras


V.

tan piṅrvanaṅkva matikêka salahku śīlā

yadyastun aṅləṅəṅa tovi marêṅ vanādri

matya ṅhulun kaka kagunturan āsana mrik

yan vanya sāha ri rarasnira vetniṅ harṣa


VI.

akveh sahur haji taṅeha yadin vivākṣaṅ

prāptaṅ kuləm huvus avās kəñar iṅ śaśāṅka

ləṅləṅ sirâṅinəp anūti manah sarāga

svecchânəkāni kalaṅən sakaharṣa-harṣa


VII.

təkvan ḍataṅ sahananiṅ paricārikârūm

mvaṅ saṅ karaṇḍan atatâmrih aseva bhakti

ṅūnīn lanâmarəka rakva ri saṅ suputrī

moghâviṅit sira mahā mara riṅ kaśūnyan


VIII.

maṅken sukhâmbəkira rāmya marin saśoka

mvaṅ saṅ narārya maṅinum tvak asuhka-rāmyan

rūmniṅ mṛdaṅga saha gīta manoharâṅras

svargâvatāra sabhinuktinirâdvitīya


IX.

tatkāla sampunira ləṅləṅ amukti-mukti

muṅgah sirêṅ gṛhalatā saṅ arūm tinuntun

tan varṇanən raras i solahirê samaṅka

maṅgəh sirân savəṅi lālana tan kənêṅ prəm



Canto 51

I.

avicaritan kuləm rahina riṅ samantara suməṅ sənə̄niṅ aruṇa

manuk alaṅə̄ svaranya kadi māgadhâmuṅu nareśvarâṅajəṅ unəṅ

tuhun akadat siran lagi tinaṅhi lālana jənək ri saṅ nṛpasuta

avarəg an aṅharas pipi sumār pilih bəkəla yan vijil sira məne


II.

avuṅu nareśvarârahup abhūṣaṇâhyas asəkar huvus mavədihan

lumaku marêṅ sabhā mijil aseva yatna sira tan vuruṅ pratidina

para ratu saṅ samaṅjuru marək paḍâbhinava suprabhârja kuməñar

iniṅət-iṅət pva rakva kadi vintaṅən kadi narendra kṛṣṇa vulana


III.

tuvi sira saṅ vatək ratu tamuy nareśvara huvus matiṅkah atata

narapati kāravīra saha koraveśvara makādi dharmatanaya

sira pinakapradhāna hana len muvah tan ucapən paḍâpratihata

kṛtayaśa vīryamanta sira nora maṇḍaguṇaśakti deva sakala


IV.

piraṅ ivu lakṣa koṭi sira sə̄k səsək pənuh ikaṅ sabhā təkapira

paḍa hinarimbavā sinəgəhan sirêṅ vacana somya de narapati

maṇimaya sarvabhūṣaṇa dukūla mūlya dulur iṅ sərəh kinajaṅan

hinaturakən ri saṅ nṛpsamūha kapva ta lināvə-lāvəkənira


V.

paḍa rəṇa saṅ vatək ratu kabeh pənuh sukha tuhun taṅeh yan ucapən

pira ta kunaṅ lavasniran aṅanti lot rahina rātri pinrih inivə̄

karaṇanirâlavas nṛpati kṛṣṇa rakva vinaraṅ lavan saṅ araras

abhinava kadbhutâhaləp ikaṅ vivāha saha yajñakārya ginave


VI.

ri huvus ikaṅ vivāha tadanantarândan amuhun ta saṅ para ratu

paḍa mulih iṅ svarājya naranātha kṛṣṇa kavəkas lanâmahayu rāt

pinakasurakṣa rakṣaka sirân prasiddha vinuvus trilokavaraṇa

tuhu jayaśatru saṅ prabhu vanîṅ bhayâpratitasāra śūra vijaya



Canto 52

I.

saṅipta sampun alavas pakurən narendra

nityâṅhajəṅ turida rāga lavan sudevī

akveh muvah vini nareśvara tan vivākṣan

maṅkin matambəh aṅusiṅ kasahasrabhagyan


II.

ṅhiṅ pat pradhāna pinatihnira rājapatni

dyah rukmiṇī mvaṅ ika jāmbavatī manojña

vvantən jayêṅ turida nāgnajitâsugih rūm

mvaṅ saṅ susatya maṅaran vara satyabhāma


III.

hyaṅ ṡrī dinūmnira śarīranirêki ṅūni

devī vəḍî luputa janma bhaṭāra viṣṇu

hetunya pat pinakamūrtinirêrikiṅ rāt

saprāṇa rāmya sapanivyan atūt silih sih


IV.

maṅkin sukhâmbəkira kapva huvus maputra

saṅ sāmba nāma vəka jāmbavatī kasaṅkhya

saṅ kāraṇê patinikaṅ ripu bhoma riṅ praṅ

de kṛṣṇa riṅ carita yajñavatī prakāśa


V.

mvaṅ rukmiṇī muvah aputra mahāprabhāva

pradyumna nāma rasikā kanakādhikāra

potrâniruddha ginave hala detya bāṇa

sampun tikā subhaga keṭətakuśyavati


VI.

maṅkin subaddha mapagəh paṅadəg narendra

ṅkā tan ləkas maməjahī karavīranātha

saṅ bhīma sāhasa vinidhyaṅirântakanya

doṣanya nirghṛṇan amañjara rājasaṅghya


VII.

ṅkānê sabhācarita yan mati cedirāja

de saṅ narendra ri titirnya maveh larâmbək

maṅkā suyodhana təkêṅ kulagotra hənti

saṅ pañca pāṇḍava dinonira matyanêka


VIII.

ndah bhraṣṭa sampun alilaṅ talutuhnikaṅ rāt

vīrya pratāpa naranātha dumehnya maṅka

yekân kṛtaṅ bhuvana tan hana duhkhamātra

dvāpara tan paṅaṅsan hana saṅ narendra


IX.

taṅheh matêkin ucapən gati saṅ narendra

svargastha lālana muvah sira viṣṇujāti

mvaṅ putra-putra kula vāndhava nora kāri

āpan huvus hilaṅ ikaṅ katakut vatək hyaṅ



Canto 53

I.

ndah atīta lavas bhaṭāra viṣṇu

hana riṅ svarga masevan iṅ vatək hyaṅ

vəkasan pralayā jagat viśīrṇa

kalikâṅāvatarâṅruruh triloka


II.

hana deśa ləṅə̄n ləyəp laṅə̄nya

ri yavadvīpa kasaṅkhya nūsa saśrī

palupuy hyaṅ agastya tan hanôli

yatikā trāya hilaṅ haləpnya maṅke


III.

umuvah ta sirā vatək hyaṅ asvī

anaḍah tā ri bhaṭāra padmanābha

yatikā pulihən laṅə̄nya rakṣan

ri sira hyaṅ hari tan vihaṅ lumampah


IV.

irikān dadi bhūpati prasiddha

paripurṇākən ikaṅ prajâtiśobha

subhagan madhusūdanâvatāra

sira ta śrī jayaśatru kaprakāśa


V.

tuvi saṅ hyaṅ agastya yatna śīghra

atəmah bhikṣuka paṇḍitâdhikāra

guru de haji maṅgəh iṅ paṅajyan

sira tekā pinatihnikaṅ sarājya


VI.

apagəh paṅadəg hajin hanêṅ rāt

samusuh śrī naranātha kapva bhakti

anubhāva munīndra kāraṇanya

kavidagdhānira riṅ nayâtisūkṣma


VII.

ndatan adva muvah kṛtānikaṅ rāt

paḍa yatnêṅ yaśa dāna dharma śāstra

vvaṅ aṅāśraya mūla hīna-dīna

dumadak vṛddhi sukhanya ri samaṅkā


VIII.

ya ta kaprih-ati manah narendra

ri masantānaniṅ artha tulya varṣa

avanəh naranātha rī bhinukti

lila-līlā ta sirâhyun iṅ kalaṅvan


IX.

ya nimittaniraṅ kavīndrarājya

aturun bhāṣa paṅastutîṅ narendra

sinuvalnira ri smitā saharṣa

adulur dāna karas tanah sakahyun


X.

ṅvaṅ atêki lanā tumiṅhal āṅin

alupân mūḍha kədə̄ linolyan iṅ hyaṅ

ika kāraṇani ṅhulun tan eraṅ

tumatâmarṇa laṅə̄ vilāpa mātra


XI.

ulih i ṅhulun aṅləṅə̄ṅ bhramanta

mahas iṅ priṅga pasir vukir paraṅ groṅ

təhər abrata kaṅlihan kaləsvan

gumuliṅ riṅ vatu kāmukan himâvra



Canto 54

I.

ry antukni ṅhulun aṅləṅə̄ṅ raga-ragan humatur i naranātha lūṅ laṅə̄

avvat kekətan iṅ kathā kunəṅ apan virasa guru lagunya tan patūt

tan dvâṅdagdha vuyuṅniran vival i tan hanani təvasiran muruk laṅə̄

vetniṅ krodha dinuhkha-duhkhanira ri ṅhulun avədi lanâtakis karas


II.

ndan kədvākəna têki mon guyu-guyun mapaṅ ulaha sadenya cəṅgana

moghâṅdeya kadigjayañ juga ri saṅ prabhu ṅuni-ṅuni hayvaniṅ jagat

saṅ śuddhyânularâstusiddhya karuhun saṅ amaca ṅuniveh saṅ aṅrəṅə̄

āpan ṅhiṅ yaśa don ikiṅ panuluh aṅracaṇa carita viṣṇuvarṇana


III.

tambenyan paṅikətkv apet laləh ulih-hulihan ikana haṅrarah laṅə̄

maṅkin bəṇḍu tikin tumūt ri haji kālaniran aṅayu siṅhavikrama

maṅke pvaṅ harivaṅśaparva vinuvusnya viphala satutuknya tan padon

ndan hopən palar amrakāśakəna caṇḍi saṅ inaləm akīrti pustaka



Canto 55

I.

harivaṅśa kathānyasta

jarāsandha parājaya

rukmiṇī haraṇākyata

jāyajāstutivarṇana



Bibliography

Edited by Teeuw (1950). Acquisition of digital data by Arlo Griffiths through OCR. First round of structuring and cleaning in txt by Danielle Chen (2021), after which Axelle Janiak structured the data in TEI format (2025).

Teeuw, A.. 1950. Hariwaṅśa: Vertaling en aantekeningen. ’s-Gravenhage: Nijhoff.

70 <text xml:space="preserve">
. <body>
. <div type="edition" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">
.<div><ab type="invocation">avighnam astu namaḥ śivāya</ab></div>
.
75<div type="canto" n="1" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita">
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">ṅkānê śṛṅganikaṅ vukir ṅhulun amūjâmrih madevāśraya</l>
.<l n="b">dhyāyî prāpta bhaṭāra viṣṇu hiniḍəp muṅgvêṅ səkar paṅkaja</l>
.<l n="c">siddhāniṅ kalaṅə̄n prayojananiṅ aṅgəṅ dhyāna viṣṇvarcana</l>
80<l n="d">maṅgālāniṅ avətva bhāṣita maran maṅgəh sinəṅgah kavi</l>
. <!--<app>c) -nirâṅgəṅ ABDE; nyāna A1BD1E; d) maṅgalyā F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="2">
85<l n="a">ndā tan lena tikaṅ kathâjarakəna ṇhiṇ kastavan hyaṅ hari</l>
.<l n="b">rūm-rūmən gəlarən vilāpa kakavin muṅgvêṅ ləpitniṅ karas</l>
.<l n="c">ndan dūrân kavaśâmalar ṅhulun apan sinvī kinon de haji</l>
.<l n="d">śrī dharmeśvara digjâyañ jayabhayâpañ jāti viṣṇvātmaka</l>
. <!--<app>a) ndan A2, ndin A1BCDE; kavā B1D1E, kapā B2; d) digjayā A2D2F; jayajaya ABDE.</app> -->
90
.</lg>
.<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">tan saṅkê vihikan mara ṅhulun apan maṅgəh kaciryan tivas</l>
.<l n="b">puṣpāñjalya ri jə̄ṅ Janārdana juga ṅhiṅ don ikī tan vaneh</l>
95<l n="c">hetunyan harivaṅśaparva vaṅunən tūtən lalaṅvākəna</l>
.<l n="d">cihnāniṅ vinuruk-vuruk təkapira śrī lūn laṅə̄ riṅ laṅə̄</l>
. <!--<app>a) saṅkêṅ ABDEF; kadhiryan A1BDE; b) Janārndana A1BE; ikiṅ d2; c) lalāṅə̄kəna ABCDE.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
100
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="2" met="jagaddhita">
.
.<lg n="1">
105<l n="a">ṅūnin kāla bhaṭāra viṣṇu dadi bhūpati pinakasurākṣaniṅ jagat</l>
.<l n="b">śūrânindya narendra kṛṣṇa paṅaran ri sira katakut iṅ parāṅmukha</l>
.<l n="c">vetbet soma hirêkihən kula tikiṅ yadukula vasudevanandana</l>
.<l n="d">sākṣat āmṛtaniṅ sarāt siran aveh sukhan aməjahi duṣṭadurjana</l>
. <!--<app>a) ṅūnîṅ A, ṅūṅî F; c) hikiṅ ABD1E, hiki F.</app> -->
110
.</lg>
.<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">təkvan rovaṅ irâṅəmit bhuvanavastu kakanira sirâpisaṅ hurip</l>
.<l n="b">khyātîṅ rāt baladevanāma paḍa tan hana siriṅanirêṅ parākrama</l>
115<l n="c">candrāditya maṅiṇḍarat karika liṅha ri siran adulur paḍâhaləp</l>
.<l n="d">pakṣânīrṇakənan musuh kadi pətəṅ hibək asaləsək in raṇāṅgaṇa</l>
. <!--<app>c) manindarāt F; d) asaləsak ABD1E.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
120<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">ndan sāndīpani nāma saṅ yati paṅajyanira sira tikā purohita</l>
.<l n="b">maṅgəh yan pinakāṣṭaliṅga sira tūt sumaguṇan adhikāra riṅ sabhā</l>
.<l n="c">sākṣāt deva maheśvarâdadi sirânupama nipuṇa śāstrapāraga</l>
.<l n="d">aṅde duhkha sirê hyaṅ indra ri ləvihni guṇanira sasat vṛhaspati</l>
125 <!--<app>a) saṇḍīpraṇi A1B1CDE; b) samaguṇa F; d) nirê ACDE, nirêṅ B.</app> -->
.</lg>
.<lg n="4">
.<l n="a">yapvan saṅ pinakāṅgarakṣa haji riṅ samara sahana saṅ vatək yadu</l>
.<l n="b">saṅ mantrī kṛtavarma sātyaki samâmava sira pinakādi nītiman</l>
130<l n="c">kapvânindya mahāprabhāva sira len balanira kadi siṅha sāyuta</l>
.<l n="d">svasthaṅ śatru hatur gajəṅdra śatakoṭi karika dinəmaknya riṇ raṇa</l>
. <!--<app>4. a) hadi A2, hajəṅ B1, haja D1; b) pinakā A1, pinakāsi BD1E, pinakêsi F; d) dhvasta F; ka A1 i.p.v. kadika A2BCDE.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
135<lg n="5">
.<l n="a">don saṅ hyaṅ hari yan dadi prabhu sumādhya ri hilaṅanikaṅ durātmaka</l>
.<l n="b">bhoma mvaṅ ratu kaṅsa kālayavanâṅharu-hara təka riṅ kadevatan</l>
.<l n="c">yâṅde trāsa ri saṅ vatək hyaṅ akuyaṅ kadi jaladha ri meghaniṅ kapat</l>
.<l n="d">syuh denyân təkap iṅ kaśakti təkap i drəs i balanika yan panub lavan</l>
140 <!--<app>a) ndon C; b) -yavava- A1B1D1, yavavanha- A2, yavavi ha E; d) in drəs ACE; in bala CD1E; panūb avan A1BD1, panūt F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="6">
.<l n="a">ndā tattvanya kasaṅkhya tan pəjaha deniṅ amara ṛṣi daitya dānava</l>
145<l n="b">aṅhiṅ mānuṣa śakti ta pva pinakāntakanika pavəkas hyaṅ īśvara</l>
.<l n="c">nāhan marma bhaṭāra viṣṇu manurun dadi ratu jayaśatru śaktiman</l>
.<l n="d">tan pendah surabahni riṅ gati lanâṅgəsəṅi musuh avarṇa sāgara</l>
. <!--<app>a) ndan CF; d) suravāgni ABCDE; riṅ tilabhāgê- c1; cālita lanâ F; labhā D1E.</app> -->
.
150</lg>
.<lg n="7">
.<l n="a">tan dvân siṅ kalanâlilaṅ sakahananya pinəjahanirêṅ samaṅkana</l>
.<l n="b">kaṅsa bhraṣṭa sarājya kālayavana kṣaṇa gəsəṅ inupāya denira</l>
.<l n="c">aṅhiṅ bhoma turuṅ dinonira hinerakənira karaṇanya patyana</l>
155<l n="d">yapvan lagya hulahnya duṣṭa niyatanya vavanira rikaṅ yamālaya</l>
. <!--<app>a) âlilâ A1B1C1.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="8">
160<l n="a">mvaṅ dug vyākula rakva buddhinira rañca ri gatiniran ahyun apriyā</l>
.<l n="b">ndā śrīmūrti hinerniran labuha marmaniṅ aṅaraṅ aṅə̄lakən smara</l>
.<l n="c">yâṅde tan huniṅān irêriya mahâṅinak-inak apa tan ya saṅśaya</l>
.<l n="d">aṅhiṅ lot kinirenirê hati saṅ adyah amuṅarana rāmyaniṅ pura</l>
. <!--<app>a) ndan F; kahuny D; b) marmaniṅ aṅən aṅaṅə̄lakən smara A2B1CE,
165 — alaṅa kaṅə̄n smara A1, — aṅaṅanalakən smara(?) D, laṅənaṅənaṅə̄laken B2;
. c) ya saṅśaya ABCDE; d) kinire-kire D2; amuṅaraba B1D1.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="9">
170<l n="a">ṅkānê dvāravatī ṅaranya vəkas iṅ nagara parama kādbhutâhaləp</l>
.<l n="b">bapranya sphaṭikâruhur kadi gunuṅ paṅadəg i gupuranya bhāsvara</l>
.<l n="c">aṅde trāsa larapnikaṅ maṇik apuy pinakapuca-pucaknya bhīṣaṇa</l>
.<l n="d">saṅ hyaṅṅarka tumuṅgaṅ arga mara liṅniṅ umulat iriyan sakêṅ adoh</l>
. <!--<app>c) trā- ontbr. in C1; apva C1; d) of hyaṅ harka; arga F; līni C1; umulah C.</app> -->
175
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="10">
.<l n="a">ṅkānê heṅ vataṅan təkêṅ alun-alun maṇimaya vinaṅun paḍâruhur</l>
180<l n="b">sākṣāt parvata bahni kapva hiḍəp iṅ lumihat i mahatəpnya kañcaṇa</l>
.<l n="c">rantun-rantunan iṅ ghanâjajar aniṅgilis i nagaraniṅ samīraṇa</l>
.<l n="d">məltuk piṇḍa kukusnya muntab umarêṅ laṅit amaravaśaṅ surālaya</l>
. <!--<app>b) lumiyat ABD1; pahetəpnya(p) C2, pakəkəsnya F; c) -tilis D1;
. iṅ agara BD1; inavər ikaṅ F.</app> -->
185
.</lg>
.<lg n="11">
.<l n="a">riṅ jro pañcabale turuṅ sahananiṅ vaṅunan inuparəṅga riṅ tatur</l>
.<l n="b">aṅlīlā kayu kalpapuṣpa satatâsəkar asəmi tinandur iṅ natar</l>
190<l n="c">kumbannyâṅrəṅ arūm tumepaṅavatiṅ mrak akirab i pucaknikaṅ gaḍuh</l>
.<l n="d">darpânavvaṅ ariṅ ri tan panas iṅ arka tinavəṅan i tejaniṅ maṇik</l>
. <!--<app>a) ri jro CE; b) aṅilā C; nāgapuṣpa F, muspa A1, kalpapa B1; c) -i mrak C, -īmuka F; gabuh A1; d) arîri c, irîri ABDE.</app> -->
.
.
195</lg>
.<lg n="12">
.<l n="a">riṅ tāman talaganya sāgara pamanya riṅacaṇa karaṅnya tūt sisi</l>
.<l n="b">nūsanyâlaləh arja sə̄k alas-alasnya kusuma sumavur marêṅ bañu</l>
.<l n="c">prāsāda sphaṭikê təṅahnya kadi mandaragiri ñamut iṅ ghanâruhur</l>
200<l n="d">pūcaknyôjvala candrakānta minahā səpə-səpərananiṅ niśākara</l>
. <!--<app>b) kusumavur B1; sumahur B2D1E; c) ri panaput iṅ F; aṅ ghanaṅruhur C.</app> -->
.
.
.</lg>
205<lg n="13">
.<l n="a">lor vetanya gunuṅ-gunuṅ hana mahantən aṅililan adoh tiniṅhalan</l>
.<l n="b">āpan deni ruhurnya lāgi paran iṅ ləṅəṅ alək amilaṅ pasir vukir</l>
.<l n="c">vvaṅnyâṅgīta hanâṅgupit lali maṅə̄ lumihat i ləṅəṅ iṅ nabhastala</l>
.<l n="d">leṅləṅ ta pva bhaṭāra sūrya ri səḍəṅnira humalivat aṅrəṅə̄ kiduṅ</l>
210 <!--<app>c) âṅgapit B1E; lasi D.</app> -->
.
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="14">
215<l n="a">len têkaṅ paricārikā sahananiṅ vvan i daləm alaṅə̄ macaṅkrama</l>
.<l n="b">təkvan tan vruh i bhedaniṅ vəṅi lavan rahina təkap ikaṅ maṇiprabhā</l>
. <l n="c">vyarthaṅ sītakarâkucəm kadi kameraṅən i mukhanikaṅ varāṅganā</l>
.<l n="d">āpan tiṅgal ikākutapva tuvi rājasa bari-bari pinraṅ iṅ halis</l>
. <!--<app>a) len... ka B1; daləm umahas F; d) bari i.p.v. bari2 A1; d) tiṅhal C; rājatanaya bari F.</app> -->
220
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="15">
.<l n="a">maṅkā yan kahaḍaṅ marêṅ paṅuṅaṅan mədalakən i liriṅnikâṅlare</l>
225<l n="b">aṅras tvas pamuputnya pahyas i səḍaṅnya haṅun-aṅun arumpukan səkar</l>
.<l n="c">ndātan saṅka ri mākarāga niki duṣṭa kira-kiranikâpa kantara</l>
.<l n="d">ūyut riṅ mulatê hajəṅnya niyatā kalara lagi kasaṇḍuṅên ratha</l>
. <!--<app>a) marê B; nikâlarê BC; b) aṅrəs BDE; hamuṅari marum- F; d) oyut D; oyut yan F; mulatā abcdE; rī BD.</app> -->
.
230
.</lg>
.<lg n="16">
.<l n="a">hīṅanyan taya manda-manda sahanêṅ nagara maṇimaya prabhāsvara</l>
.<l n="b">ndah svargâṅavatāra ta pva ya hade siluman iki panarkaniṅ mulat</l>
235<l n="c">bvatniṅ bhoga kunaṅ pitanya ḍavuh iṅ kṣititala tumibā sakêṅ laṅit</l>
.<l n="d">paṅliṅganya narendra viṣṇu sakalânurun amaluyakən jagaddhita</l>
. <!--<app>a) iṅhanyā ABDE, iṅanya C1; c) ṇyut AD, byut BE; mitanya BCDE; d) pan liṅgāna ABCDE.</app> -->
.
.
240</lg>
.<lg n="17">
.<l n="a">ndān aṅhiṅ hiki citta saṅ prabhu sarāga ri gatiniran ahyun apriyā</l>
.<l n="b">təkvan śrī baledeva yan huvus asakrama rara hayu rājaputrikā</l>
.<l n="c">maṅkin tâsəmi rāganiṅ hati vavaṅ lumalay asəmu luṅgah iṅ gaduṅ</l>
245<l n="d">agyâvətva səkar paveha riṅ akuṅ malara tiki manəmva rambatan</l>
. <!--<app>a) ṅhiki B; b) akarma CF; c) āsəmi C; d) agrâ- a1; sā... B1, saksar B2, sāśnya d; maveha B2D, veha B1; malaha ABCDE.</app> -->
.
.
.</lg>
250<lg n="18">
.<l n="a">riṅ tāman sira yan maṅə̄ sahaja rañca katuridan i rāmyaniṅ kapat</l>
.<l n="b">rāgī deni patərnya mandra karəṅə̄ sapaṅəsah iṅ akuṅ kinolakən</l>
.<l n="c">mātrâṅras larap iṅ naṅeṇḍah alaṅə̄ raga-ragaṅ anilib kənêṅ iraṅ</l>
.<l n="d">tān akveh rarab iṅ rərəb hana saluhniṅ apilara kapəñcar in kuku</l>
255 <!--<app>b) rāga B1CDE; c) vaṅendah D2, paṅendah F; təkêṅ karaṅ F; d) tan makveh F; kapəñcir F.</app> -->
.
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="19">
260<l n="a">maṅkin bhrānta rimaṅ-rimaṅ manahirâmaṅu-maṅu lali tan kəne paṅan</l>
.<l n="b">deniṅ rāga huvā tan andəl apa tan vihikananiṅ iniṣṭi konəṅa</l>
.<l n="c">mantən vruh riṅ anāgatā mvaṅ irikaṅ kira-kira dadi janma mānuṣa</l>
.<l n="d">ndan yatnân vinarah ri tattvanira ṅūni karaṇanira tan baraṅ priyā</l>
. <!--<app>a) kənêṅ paṅan ABDE; b) deni A; apa tan vəḍi rikanaṅ F; c) irikā F.</app> -->
265
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="20">
.<l n="a">liṅsir pvaṅ ravi rəb ḍataṅ ta sira nārada sukha ta manah narādhipa</l>
270<l n="b">yatnâṅasvakən arghya pādya saha cāmana saha sərəh arja riṅ kajaṅ</l>
.<l n="c">ojar bhāgya ta yan sinanmataṅ asevaka ri ləmah i jəṅ mahāmuni</l>
.<l n="d">gə̄ṅ bhāgyan juga rānaka mpu ri ḍataṅ yativara kadi hisniṅ āmṛta</l>
. <!--<app>a) pvā ravi ABDE; rəp F; b) âṅasyak ABCDE; inagya AC1DE; d) kahiḍəpniṅ ABDE.</app> -->
.</lg>
275
.
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="3" met="upendravajrā">
.
280<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">na liṇnira ndah sumahur maharṣi</l>
.<l n="b">uḍuh prabhuṅkv arja dahat vuvusta</l>
.<l n="c">vruh i ṅhulun yan haji viṣṇumūrti</l>
.<l n="d">ya hetuniṅ prāpta taman vənaṅ sah</l>
285 <!--<app>1. b) prabhukv ABC1D1E; huvusta E; c) vruha F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">səḍaṅta ṅūnin dadi rāmabhadra</l>
290<l n="b">yatna ṅhulun denta vineh sukhâgə̄ṅ</l>
.<l n="c">hana pva yan kṛṣṇa dadinta maṅke</l>
.<l n="d">kaṭuṅka tātan valəsa ry asihta</l>
. <!--<app>a) səḍəṅta D; b) yata F; d) kavuṅka AB1D1E.</app> -->
.
295</lg>
.<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">tuvi pva saṅ nātha səḍəṅ prapañca</l>
.<l n="b">atən tuməmvākəna mūrtiniṅ śrī</l>
.<l n="c">huvus tikâjanma viśeṣakanyā</l>
300<l n="d">nda rukminī nāmaniran jayêṅ rūm</l>
. <!--<app>c) tikâṅjanma B2; d) -âñjayəṅ C.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="4">
305<l n="a">prakāśitan bhīṣmakarājaputrī</l>
.<l n="b">tuvin pakebv ī pṛthukīrtidevī</l>
.<l n="c">ndi saṅ prabhū tan vruha ri svavarga</l>
.<l n="d">kunaṅ yayan mājara taṅ bhujaṅga</l>
. <!--<app>b) pratukīrti- AC1; c) nda F; svamarga F; d) yatan F; haṅ bhu- D.</app> -->
310
.</lg>
.<lg n="5">
.<l n="a">kakinta saṅ kuntabhojādhirāja</l>
.<l n="b">sirêkahən mānak anāma kuntī</l>
315<l n="c">makāri rāma prabhū len rva seriṅ</l>
.<l n="d">śrutaśravā mvaṅ pṛthukīrtidevī</l>
. <!--<app>a) kuntibhoja B1D, Kuntabhujâ F; b) sirêkihən F; -arāmanātha F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
320<lg n="6">
.<l n="a">śrutaśravā reṇa narendra cedya</l>
.<l n="b">samogha kədva hyunirê suputrī</l>
.<l n="c">təlas jarāsandha hiner avidhya</l>
.<l n="d">hapan sirâṅhiṅ pinisiṅgih iṅ rāt</l>
325 <!--<app>a) âṅreṇa AB1CDE, cedya: vaak ceddya of ceddhya gespeld;
. b) kədyə A1B1C1E; hyun iṅ suputrikā ABCDE; d) hapaṅ A.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="7">
330<l n="a">kunaṅ pasambandhan ikā mamakṣan</l>
.<l n="b">sakêṅ kaki śrī basu nāma rāja</l>
.<l n="c">sirâvəka rvaṅ siki bhūmipāla</l>
.<l n="d">vṛhadratha mvaṇ dhanaghoṣa nāma</l>
. <!--<app>d) vṛthāṅśa yari F; damaghoṣa B2.</app> -->
335
.</lg>
.<lg n="8">
.<l n="a">vṛhadrathâputra ri śatru nātha</l>
.<l n="b">nyataṅ jarāsandha mahāprabhāva</l>
340<l n="c">saṅ iṅ kapiṅ rvâvêka cedirāja</l>
.<l n="d">mataṅnya tan len mamisaṅ paḍâtūt</l>
. <!--<app>b) nyata J- B1; c) aṅiṅ? B2; d) matannya C.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
345<lg n="9">
.<l n="a">hanan pva saṅ nātha hasep[p]ramāda</l>
.<l n="b">sirêka tâtūt ya marā ri cedya</l>
.<l n="c">na liṅ maharṣin pamuhun visāta</l>
.<l n="d">pralīna riṅ sthāna nirākisāna</l>
350 <!--<app>a) hade C2D2F; pramāddha A2BCD1, pramāṇḍa A1;

.
.</lg>
.<lg n="10">
355<l n="a">nda têki sampun vinarah saharṣa</l>
.<l n="b">suməṅ rarasniṅ hati ləṅləṅ onaṅ</l>
.<l n="c">byatīta mantuk sira tan vivākṣan</l>
.<l n="d">lalūṅ dinaṅ ratri huvus kalalvan</l>
. <!--<app>a) maharṣi F; b) ati A1B1E; monaṅ AB1C1D1E; d) lalū dina ABCDE; kalaṅvan F.</app> -->
360</lg>
.</div>
.
.<div type="canto" n="4"><!-- <note type="prosody">[a local-Javanese kṛti meter, used also in cantos 16 and 26. ⏑ ⏑ – | ⏑ – ⏑ | ⏑ ⏑ – | ⏑ ⏑ ⏑ | ⏑ ⏑ ⏑ | – ⏑ – | ⏑ ⏓ ]</note> -->
.<note>See Zoetmulder, Kalangwan p.462
365</note>
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">sakatambay eñjiṅ irikā narapati makire lumampaha</l>
.<l n="b">ḍatəṅêṅ sabhā nṛpati bhīṣmaka maṅalap i ratnakanyakā</l>
.<l n="c">ndan aṅel sirâṅiṅət-iṅət ləkasaniṅ umarânuṅ enaka</l>
370<l n="d">yadiyan panomaha hade matiki tan ulah iṅ tulus jaya</l>
. <!--<app>1. b) ḍatəṅê C; c) ləkasakiṅ B1.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="2">
375<l n="a">mvaṅ ikin təkâlurugan aṅruraha nagara tan tahən hati</l>
.<l n="b">valatən ta saṅ rara kisapva lari saphalaniṅ jayên raṇa</l>
.<l n="c">tunaraśmi tan hana laṅə̄nya luput i raras iṅ karāsikan</l>
.<l n="d">viphala prayāsa rakət iṅ smara turida ya tan paluṅ laṅə̄
.</l> <!--<app>b) kisapvana ri(?) D2; d) pvayāsa A2(?).</app> -->
380
.</lg>
.<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">ya mataṅnya yukti naya sūkṣma ləkasakəna liṅnirê hati</l>
.<l n="b">kirimən vilāpa sakarəṅ paṅavihikana kūṅ i putrikā</l>
385<l n="c">yan umom prayojana maran hañaṅakəna ri tambvaṅ iṅ vulan</l>
.<l n="d">athavā yadin vihaṅa tan vuruṅa vəlinən iṅ praṅ adbhuta
.</l> <!--<app>a) mataṅ ya C; c) tambaṅ D1.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
390<lg n="4">
.<l n="a">tadanantarā dələ-dələn mara siraṇ utusən lumampaha</l>
.<l n="b">bhayaniṅ havan ya katahā palagan alas atītadurgama</l>
.<l n="c">ya mataṅnya bhṛtyanira kāsihira hinaranan priyambada</l>
.<l n="d">yatikā kinonira səḍəṅ vinisikan irikaṅ prayojana</l>
395 <!--<app>a) dalə-dələn C1; maṅutus F; c) mataṅ ya C; hinaran B1; d) irikā C.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="5">
.<l n="a">paṅucapnirân laku silih sakarəṅ iki manahku tâgya sih</l>
400<l n="b">ndak utus parā ṅkana ri kuṇḍinanagaranirârya bhīṣmaka</l>
.<l n="c">hana rakva ratnaduhitā kəmitanira səḍaṅ manohara</l>
.<l n="d">yatikôpadin səmuni kūṅnya maran ahalən iṅ vulat maliṅ</l>
. <!--<app>a) ânaku CF; tāsyasih F; b) ndan utus AB1CDE; kuṇḍika- A1B1D1E;
. niyārya C, -kanāgaranirahārya F; d) -patin A1, -kâpadin A2BCDE; ahaləp F.</app> -->
405
.</lg>
.<lg n="6">
.<l n="a">yan alūṅa sinvam iṅ aśoka vinisikan i gəntər iṅ patər</l>
.<l n="b">ḍatəṅā kuləm haku hanīsa sumilib iri tambvaṅ iṅ vulan</l>
410<l n="c">yan iṅe lvir elika səkarniṅ asana kinirim-kirim riris</l>
.<l n="d">kayuhənkva tapva rurahən sakahanan ika tan tahən laṅə̄</l>
. <!--<app>a) hana F; alūṅha ABDE; b) kuləp C; hanissa sumiliba (F) ri tambaṅ C; c) iṅai c; raris C1.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
415<lg n="7">
.<l n="a">na vuvusnirâsəmu kalib tuhun ikaṅ inutus vicakṣana</l>
.<l n="b">vruh iṅ iṅgita ndan amuhun maluy aris avuvus kṛtâñjali</l>
.<l n="c">mvaṅ ikaṅ vilāpa vinavanya saha kanaka ratna bhūṣaṇa</l>
.<l n="d">pva ya si pravīraja ṅaranya ya dulur ika rākṣakêṅ bhaya</l>
420 <!--<app>a) niraṅ səmu ABCD1E; c) vinavan saha A, vinavanya sahana C1; naya(?) A2D, vaya F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="8">
.<l n="a">avivākṣitan mara lakunya lavan ika lavasnya riṅ havan</l>
425<l n="b">naranātha kāri sivuhən savəṅi-savəṅi saṅśayâləṅə̄ṅ</l>
.<l n="c">hana yan mahâṅikət-ikət panalimurira ləṅləṅ iṅ hati</l>
.<l n="d">pamavan ri kiṅkiṅira tan dva luluy avətu sambat iṅ rimaṅ</l>
. <!--<app>a) 1x savəṅi A1BD1, savəṅi-vəṅi D2.</app> -->
.</lg>
430
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="5" met="jagaddhita">
.
.<lg n="1">
435<l n="a">māskv induṅ riṅ apan katiṅhalana rūmta vinuni ri kalāṅən iṅ kapat</l>
.<l n="b">romantêki hanêṅ ghanâhirəṅ avas kahanan i paṅucapta riṅ patər</l>
.<l n="c">byaktā həntinikaṅ niśākara mukhanta hinəmuk-əmukan himânipis</l>
.<l n="d">kiṅkiṅkv āṅalaya ndatan pagaməlan tuna-tuna muharâṅgagap tavaṅ</l>
. <!--<app>a) ripan a1; kalaṅvan F; b) hanê c; himâhirəṅ F; c) nika abdE; hinə-
440 mukan A1; d) aṅhalaya ABDE; puvara ABDE, muvara C, puhara F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">yan petənkva manis-manista niyatêki hana ri madhuniṅ səkar miṅiṅ</l>
445<l n="b">mvaṅ rūm-rūmta ri sāriṅiṅ kusuma tan vuruṅ amənuhi harṣaniṅ rimaṅ</l>
.<l n="c">təkvan lakṣmya raras-rarasta ri hatiṅkun umulati laṅə̄niṅ ambara</l>
.<l n="d">āpan tapvan avas hajə̄ṅta hinajap lagi dadi kakavin sakêṅ hiḍəp</l>
. <!--<app>a) diyatê- C1; tanari F; c) -ta hamaṅun ṅrəs umulati F; laṅə̄ṅ ambara B1.</app> -->
.
450</lg>
.<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">nāhan vastuni denirâṅikət-ikət ginuritakən i pattraniṅ puḍak</l>
.<l n="b">tan saṅkêṅ kinire mijil-vijil iṅ ambək abayaṅan anūtakən laṅə̄</l>
.<l n="c">gəṅniṅ rāga kunaṅ ya kāraṇanikan lagi vinaca-vaca ndatan padon</l>
455<l n="d">mavvat bhrānta hanan maṅə̄ karakətan sira maṅucap-ucap lavan tika</l>
. <!--<app>a) aniṅèt-iṅət CF; b) sakêṅ BCDE, saṅkê F; vilil iṅ A1BDE; anayaṅan A2?D1; d) ni rāga D.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
.</div>
460<div type="canto" n="6" met="sragdharā">
.
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">byātītan saṅ maṅə̄ herakəna sira kakuṅ rukmiṇī têki varṇan</l>
.<l n="b">tan ryamban bhrānta ləṅləṅ sira muvah alaṅə̄ śoka tontonən onaṅ</l>
465<l n="c">āpan jātismara vruh ri kacaritanira śrīmahājanmakanyā</l>
.<l n="d">tan don iṅ ṣaḍpadêṅ campaka pinalarirê mūrti saṅ hyaṅ hupendra</l>
. <!--<app>a) siran akuṅ F; b) onəṅ A; c) -ñ janma- F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
470<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">hetunyan rājaputrī dadinira hararas katvaṅ iṅ puṣpa sālas</l>
.<l n="b">təkvan śrī bhīṣmaka khyāti yayahira jayânindya śūrêṅ raṇāṅga</l>
.<l n="c">marmanyan sə̄k ikaṅ mas pirak i sira lavan bhūṣaṇânekavarṇa</l>
.<l n="d">tar sākṣāt svarga rîkaṅ ləvih i haləp ikaṅ taṅ kaḍatvan bhinukti</l>
475 <!--<app>a) etunya B1D1; b) nyāti AB1CDE, jāti[?] B2; nyâtiśayayah C; yalah D; c) ika c;
. d) nīkaṅ AE, nika BD, riṅ ka C; hetunyan svarga sākṣāt ləvih i haləp ikā F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="3">
480<l n="a">ndātan pâṅde sukhê tvasnira sivuhən apan tan tumon janma saṅ hyaṅ</l>
.<l n="b">tovin sampun karəṅvâta siran atəmahan kṛṣṇa śūrânivārya</l>
.<l n="c">nāhan tâṅde rimaṅ ndin vənaṅa lumihatâpan sirâdoh saka ṅka</l>
.<l n="d">priṅgâlas lvah tuhun durgaman ahələtira ṅhiṅ katonêṅ paṅipyan</l>
. <!--<app>a) sivuhan A1B1C1D1E; karəṅə̄ ABCDE; c) ṅke A2D2; d) katonê BD2, katonaṅ C.</app> -->
485
.</lg>
.<lg n="4">
.<l n="a">maṅkin ləṅləṅ sira bhrānta mahas aməṅ-aməṅ riṅ taman karva ceṭi</l>
.<l n="b">ṅhiṅ kāsih kesarīnāma vihikan i hulah sânukânê suputrī</l>
490<l n="c">ndān mūlanyâharəp milva pəjaha ri sənəṅnyâṅləṅəṅ riṅ vanâdri</l>
.<l n="d">sihniṅ reṇâṅajap kāraṇanika vinavê jəṅ nirâpan təkāsih</l>
. <!--<app>a) siran C; bhramanta D; b) kecarī F; sāsukānê ABDE; c) âṅləṅī ACE,
. aləṅi B1, āləṅi B2, aləṅə D; d) tāraṇa A1B1C1DE; aṅhiṅ sihniṅ yayah reṇanikana vinave F.</app> -->
.
495</lg>
.<lg n="5">
.<l n="a">ri vvitniṅ nāgapuṣpa ndan irika ta sirâliṅgih aṅlīla-līla</l>
.<l n="b">tan kevə̄h sākni siñjaṅnira gəluṅ inurâvrā mure mrik vaṅinya</l>
.<l n="c">tan sah saṅ kesarīn aṅrahat aṅisapu jə̄ṅ samby anandāni kambaṅ</l>
500<l n="d">lālityâṅlalanâṅgīta kakavin añənər tan humuṅ mar svaranya</l>
. <!--<app>b) kevə A2, kevə̄ F; saknikaṅ keśanira F; ṅira AE, ira D; more BDE, mura A; c) taṅ F; atrahat AB1CDE; anisapi C;
. kesarī rakva hataṅisapu-F; anakduni B, adandani F; kamba B; d) âṅlalanêṅ F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
505<lg n="6">
.<l n="a">milv āśā kāsrəpan taṅ taman i səḍəṅ irân ləṅləṅ aṅlih prapañca</l>
.<l n="b">osik taṅ cāmarân tiṅhal i gəluṅanirâsāk tibâvrā səkarnya</l>
.<l n="c">ron iṅ mimbâkədal marma ri ləməs i tikəlniṅ halis yan kumiñcaṅ</l>
.<l n="d">riṅ ve nīlotpalâlum kapati luru mihat riṅ matârum lurunya</l>
510 <!--<app>a) sədaṅ A1CE; lələṅ D; leṅhayanlih F; b) gəluṅira sāk tibra havrā
. A (tibā a2) BDE, tibrā C; d) rī vve C; rulu i.p.v. luru A1B1 (alleen lu B2) C1D1E.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="7">
515<l n="a">lvir prāptânambaha vvaṅ lumihata ri sirâmānuṣārāja saṅ hyaṅ</l>
.<l n="b">sākṣāt śrīniṅ taman lālana mijil aha van sāriniṅ nāgapuṣpa</l>
.<l n="c">ndān hantukniṅ kavīndrâmrih ajapa kalaṅə̄n iṅ karas nityakāla</l>
.<l n="d">ndah nāhan paṅhiḍəpniṅ vvaṅ i siran ahajəṅ piṇḍa mukṣan pinaṇḍəṅ</l>
. <!--<app>a) lumiyatî F; siraṅ mā ABE; c) ajapma D; kaṅə̄n C1; d) pāṅiḍep A1B1D1E; mūkṣa pi-F.</app> -->
520
.</lg>
.<lg n="8">
.<l n="a">ndin tan bhrāntā tumonê kukuni sukuniran katraṅan səṅnya kumram</l>
.<l n="b">vintaṅ sankêṅ laṅit lvirnya tumurun umusap jə̄ṅnirapinta kāsih</l>
525<l n="c">riṅraṅnyan duhkha saṅ hyaṅ vulan asəpi kucəm rukṣa deniṅ mukhârum</l>
.<l n="d">marmanyâsvī tuhun kevala tan inubhayâmrih ta yâṅhera seva</l>
. <!--<app>8. a) bhrāntân F; kukunira nakəḍap ka- ABDE; sā C1 i.p.v. sə̄n; b) sākṣāt (i.p.v. vintaṅ) F; sākêṅ C; âminta C.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
530<lg n="9">
.<l n="a">tuñjuṅ baṅ līṅaniṅ vvaṅ pinususira huvus cūrṇitâṅde ṅrəs i tvas</l>
.<l n="b">doṣanyaṅ mavvaṅ edī luṅid i matanirâpan hana kveh mirahnya</l>
.<l n="c">ndān rukṣâlah sadeniṅ karatala ṅuniveh lambay aṅras lavənya</l>
.<l n="d">cihnanyan sor matanyânalahikalayatandenirâpan vah iṅ rūm</l>
535 <!--<app>a) liṅha B2; curṅa tâṅde ABCDE; b) -nyā mavvaṅ D, māvaṅ C, doṣanyan mavaṅ F;
. tan ākveh CF; rarasnya F; c) vuniveh AB1C1DE; d) -nyâsor C; alalhi A1B1C1D1, alahi A2C2, alali B2D2;
. -âṅde F; slot: vvatīru ABD, vvat i rūm E.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
540<lg n="10">
.<l n="a">ṅūnin dug pūrṇa hyasnira karika hanâmaṅpaṅê rūmnirâṅras</l>
.<l n="b">maṅke tapvan vinahvan kusuma yayan arəs deniraṅ rājalakṣmī</l>
.<l n="c">nistanyan lolya deniṅ mata lumiriṅ apan kāvaran kəmbəṅ iṅ luh</l>
.<l n="d">ndān endah maṅkin aṅde raras i hayuniran lvir liṅir mas katampvan</l>
545 <!--<app>b) denira D; c;) nistanya C; d) liṅimars BE.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="11">
.<l n="a">ndā tan vruh kesarîkā karaṇanika rimaṅ bhrānta ləṅləṅ viraṅrvaṅ</l>
550<l n="b">ndiṅ rāgâṅrəñcəma tvasnira ri hiḍəp ikâpan sirêlik riṅ eraṅ</l>
.<l n="c">sakvehniṅ rājaputrâṅhapti kiniraṅiran ratv adhīkākhya tovi</l>
.<l n="d">siṅgih vvaṅ kārtikântyanta ririsira tuhun maṅkin aṅde kalāṅən</l>
. <!--<app>b) ndi rāga C, ndin F; sirâlik ABDE; c) âṅpəti A1C1, -âpəti C2, âṅhap(ə)ti A2BE, âhpəti D; adīkākya hss;
. d) kartikānyanta F; kalaṅvan F.</app> -->
555
.</lg>
.<lg n="12">
.<l n="a">maṅke pvan śoka himpər katuridan aṅaraṅ lvirnirân bhrāntacitta</l>
.<l n="b">ndan prāptânūkṣma niṣkāraṇa manahira yan mohitâlə̄k aṅuṇḍəṅ</l>
560<l n="c">siṅgih ganyêki yan sampayira riṅ aṅajap marma denyân ulah kuṅ</l>
.<l n="d">aṅhiṅ têkī pasambyâkəna ri saṅ anarik rāga yan marya ləṅləṅ</l>
. <!--<app>b) ra-(ru-D2) mohitâṅnuk D; c) riñ [?] D.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
565<lg n="13">
.<l n="a">nāhan liṅnyê daləm tvas ndan iki saṅ aṅaraṅ maṅkin ūruk prapañca</l>
.<l n="b">tan harṣê nyāsaniṅ tāman avukir alaṅə̄ len raṇunyârja ləṅləṅ</l>
.<l n="c">abhrā taṅ pañcuran mas maṇik i təṅah ika nūsa śobhâmahantən</l>
.<l n="d">vyarthâpan tan katon saṅ rum i maṅirisirânīs umuṅgv iṅ natarnya
570</l> <!--<app>a) êṅ daləm ABDE; b) ahukir ABDE; c) pañcaran C1; duṣa A1.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="14">
.<l n="a">taṅehniṅ kūṅ yadin tūtakəna hiḍəpiran mantuk aṅlih lumampah</l>
575<l n="b">sampun prāptê gṛhâraryan i taraban ikaṅ pañcaratnâṅudoda</l>
.<l n="c">guṇḍik sakvehnya ceṭī pada marək i sira mvaṅ vvaṅ ālālanâmbək</l>
.<l n="d">ndātan tambê putəkniṅ hati linipu-lipur maṅkin aẉde prapañca
.</l> <!--<app>a) kathakəna C; b) prāptən F; taranan B1, taran D1, taraban en taratab D2; ikā F; d) hambe D.</app> -->
.</lg>
580
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="7" met="vasantatilakā">
.
.<lg n="1">
585<l n="a">tatkāla ratnaduhitā rika śokacitta</l>
.<l n="b">saṅ kesarī prihatin epu sirâsumâlək
.</l><l n="c">nāhan mataṅnyan aharəp mijilêṅ kamantyan
.</l><l n="d">paṅlālananya putək iṅ hati tan vruh iṅ de</l>
. <!--<app> b) siraṅ F; sumaṅlək C1E, sumaṅnūk D; c) mataṅya C.</app> -->
590
.</lg>
.<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">ṅkā sādarâmuhun i jəṅ naranāthaputrī</l>
.<l n="b">leśyâṅlavā-lavadan onaṅ arāma-reṇa</l>
595<l n="c">sampun sirâṅubhayani rasikin lumakva</l>
.<l n="d">saṅṣipta lālana mijil ya sakêṅ kaḍatvan</l>
. <!--<app>b) onəṅ i rā- C; c) sirêṅubh- C; raciki n[?] lumampah F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
600<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">ndā rī sāmantara ḍatəṅ pva ya ri svaveśma</l>
.<l n="b">ṅkā tan priyambada kathañcana yā kapaṅgih</l>
.<l n="c">və̄ṅiki rakva təka somya lavan dulurnya</l>
.<l n="d">sampun pralabdha tinamuy-tamuy iṅ svavarga</l>
605 <!--<app>a) pva: ta C; b) kathañjana D2E; yar F; c) vəṅiṅki A[?], vəṅî BDE,
. vəṅy i F; d) pralaṇḍa A1B1E; i C; savarga C1.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="4">
610<l n="a">saṅ kesarî vulat avanva giraṅ vulatnya</l>
.<l n="b">ndā saṅśayâparəpəkan təkap iṅ tumiṅhal</l>
.<l n="c">vruh yan priyambada ṅaran rasikā kapaṅgih</l>
.<l n="d">aṅhiṅ ta ya syapa kitâri kadi vruhâku</l>
. <!--<app>b) âmparəpəkan F; d) tikāri C, vruhanku ABDE, vruhaṅku F.</app> -->
615
.</lg>
.<lg n="5">
.<l n="a">ndan rakva tiṅkah ika sāvaṅanan gatinya</l>
.<l n="b">tuvyâmisaṅ silih asih ta ya ṅūniṅ anvam</l>
620<l n="c">ndan saṅ priyambada karîpatiniṅ bapênduṅ</l>
.<l n="d">luṅhā ta yâṅusiri jəṅ naranātha kṛṣṇa</l>
. <!--<app>a) lāvaṅanan F; b) tūla A2, tuvvā B1, tuhvā B2, tuhva D; c) bapêbu CF;
. d) aṅusira ri AB1CD.</app> -->
.
625</lg>
.<lg n="6">
.<l n="a">maṅke pva yā vahu katon karaṇanya marma</l>
.<l n="b">duh saṅ priyambada kitâri kadî paṅipyan</l>
.<l n="c">eṅgal kitâtuha sulakṣaṇa nirvikāra</l>
630<l n="d">antən ndi saṅkani bapaṅku ləvəs lulutku</l>
. <!--<app>a) yan F; b) kadîṅ CF; d) kapaṅku B, sapaṅku D.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="7">
635<l n="a">oṃ kesarī kaka sabhāgya kitan kapaṅgih</l>
.<l n="b">nohanku tan sipi pilih phalaniṅ brataṅku</l>
.<l n="c">vvaṅ pamrih i ṅhulun i jəṅ naranātha kṛṣṇa</l>
.<l n="d">aṅhiṅ sihanta palarən ta kasevakaṅku</l>
. <!--<app>a) kita ka- A1BDE; b) ḍala D.</app> -->
640
.</lg>
.<lg n="8">
.<l n="a">śrī kṛṣṇa ləṅləṅ aṅaraṅ kaka tan vruh iṅ de</l>
.<l n="b">bhrāntâlaṅə̄ katuridan kəna rāga tībra</l>
645<l n="c">ndan rukmiṇī sira tikā kalulut narārya</l>
.<l n="d">aṅhiṅ kitā ta pinalarku marā ri devī</l>
. <!--<app>a) in de F; d) pinalaku c.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
650<lg n="9">
.<l n="a">duh masku durgama ri donta ləvəsniṅ evəh</l>
.<l n="b">siṅgih tuhanku marikā sira ri vruhanta</l>
.<l n="c">nāntən sakê sira marêki ḍataṅku maṅke</l>
.<l n="d">tovin məne ṅvaṅ umulih sira tan vənaṅ sah</l>
655
.</lg>
.<lg n="10">
.<l n="a">nistanya maṅkana yayâkv avədî panonta</l>
.<l n="b">devī sirâsilih i kāptyan irêṅ pralāgi</l>
660<l n="c">nyâpan tahan rari sirâririsê tuhanta</l>
.<l n="d">byakta ṅhulun kavuyuṅan mapa tôlahaṅkva</l>
. <!--<app>a) avī F; c) tahan rari sê tuhanta A1B1D, -rari siliha sê- B2; d) tôla-hankva C.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
665<lg n="11">
.<l n="a">oṃ tan salah kəta vuvusta tuhun sihanta</l>
.<l n="b">kədyâku yan kita vaśâṇucapê suputrī</l>
.<l n="c">sambat nareśvaran akuṅ ya ta tâtəkākən</l>
.<l n="d">āpan pəjah sira yatan hana sih suputrī</l>
670 <!--<app>a) huvus A.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.
.<div type="canto" n="8" real="+------+--=/--+-+---+-+-="><!-- Teeuw proposed udgatavisama, but Zoetmulder lists that name under a different pattern. Compare Kalangwan Ardhasamacatuṣpadi 11+13 1* (p. 471, this pattern) with Visama 20+11+13 1 (p. 471, udgatavisama). -->
675
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">masku mapa kunəṅ ikan ulaha</l>
.<l n="b">ri gatinku kepvan apa tan vanîrika</l>
.<l n="c">təkvan i viṅit i manah saṅ arūm</l>
680<l n="d">kadi megha riṅ turida mogha yâriris</l>
. <!--<app>1. a) kunəkāṅ C1; b) vinî D.tan r</app> -->
.</lg>
.
.<lg n="2">
685<l n="a">va təlu maraṅ akūṅ ri sira</l>
.<l n="b">hana rājaputra ṅuniveh ta saṅ ratu</l>
.<l n="c">tan hana rari maṅənê tvasira</l>
.<l n="d">lagi keraṅan sahasa yâtəvas taṅis</l>
. <!--<app>a) maṅara C; b) -putri A1BC1DE; c) paṅənê C.</app> -->
690
.</lg>
.<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">nantən iki ri paṅutusta rari</l>
.<l n="b">ri təkaṅkva mājara ri jəṅ nṛpātmaja</l>
695<l n="c">tan hali-halina manahta rari</l>
.<l n="d">pəjaha ṅhulun ya tan akūṅ sirê haji</l>
.
. <!--<app>c) halinalinâ A1EF; rari: likī C1 laki C2F; d) hiji B1D1.</app> -->
.
700</lg>
.<lg n="4">
.<l n="a">bhāgya tulusakəna sihta kaka</l>
.<l n="b">vala cihna simsimira denta sūṅakən</l>
.<l n="c">kṛṣṇa pañələk iki mūlya təmən</l>
705<l n="d">tulusaṅ narādhipa tikī təkê sira</l>
. <!--<app>b) vaya F; c) aki A1B1E.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="5">
710<l n="a">len vacanarasa vilāpa muvah</l>
.<l n="b">pituvin ginopita riṅipta riṅ tatur</l>
.<l n="c">marma rasaniki pirəṅvakəna</l>
.<l n="d">palar aṅravat-ravata luh kuməmbəṅa</l>
. <!--<app>b) hatur F; c) pirəṅəkəna A1B1CDE; d) -rava luh AB1DE.</app> -->
715
.</lg>
.<lg n="6">
.<l n="a">ndan yan umiṅisa sirā ya riris</l>
.<l n="b">tan agadgadaṅ nuvala rāga saṅ prabhu</l>
720<l n="c">eraṅ an uripa vuvus nṛpati</l>
.<l n="d">ḍatəṅā liṅīra gitanyaṅ apraṅa</l>

.
725</lg>
.<lg n="7">
.<l n="a">tan viluma sira təkaṅluruga</l>
.<l n="b">ndan ikā vilāpa sakarəṅ təkākəna</l>
.<l n="c">sampun ika pavarahaṅkva kaka</l>
730<l n="d">laku śīghra śīghra kita herən i ṅhulun</l>
. <!--<app>b) ikaṅ F; c) varahaṅkva B1; d) 1x śīghra D.</app> -->
.</lg>
.</div>
.
735<div type="canto" n="9">
. <!-- <note type="prosody">[Undocumented triṣṭubh meter. Used also in canto 17. – – – | ⏑ ⏑ – | ⏑ – ⏑ | ⏑ – ⏑ | – ⏑ ]</note> -->
.
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">anten ṅhiṅ sahuraṅkva hayva tâgya</l>
740<l n="b">evəhni ṅvaṅ anəmva kāladeśa</l>
.<l n="c">yogyān antyakənanta līla-līla</l>
.<l n="d">denyâlobha lavas lamun kasiddhan</l>
. <!--<app>b) ṅva nəmva F; kalā- A1; d) lamuṅ A.</app> -->
.
745</lg>
.<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">yan ṅvaṅ paṅdadakê manah suputrī</l>
.<l n="b">ṅkā prāptānira madhyaniṅ samudra</l>
.<l n="c">antaprāyanirâtərəh riṅ āmbək</l>
750<l n="d">ajro durgama yan pənuh kalaṅən</l>
. <!--<app>d) talāṅən D, kalaṅvan F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="3">
755<l n="a">yadyan sāhasanâta de narendra</l>
.<l n="b">svīkāran valatən rikeṅ kaśaktin</l>
.<l n="c">noraṅ rāsika duhkhavṛddhi denya</l>
.<l n="d">byaktaṅ praṅ niyatêki karṇaśūla</l>
. <!--<app>a) sāhasaṅ nātha A1BDE; b) rikaṅ C; c) nora rāsika C; -ddhi ndenya A1B, -ddhin den D, nenya E.</app> -->
760
.</lg>
.<lg n="4">
.<l n="a">enak tâṅ akirê ri kūṅa devī</l>
.<l n="b">vruhni ṅvaṅ maṅənāna kāmalolya</l>
765<l n="c">rūmrūm śrī naranātha lot karəṅva</l>
.<l n="d">rūpa mvaṅ guṇa len rarasniṅ ambək</l>

.

770<lg n="5">
.<l n="a">yan sampun kahiriṅ manah suputrī</l>
.<l n="b">ṅkā prāptā naranātha hayva lupta</l>
.<l n="c">rəsrəsniṅ mahañaṅ-hañaṅ ya bhuktin</l>
.<l n="d">sūkṣmāniṅ sari tambvaṅ in śaśāṅka</l>
775 <!--<app>a) panah D; b) ṅlupta C; c) 1x -hañaṅ AB1D; bhuktikanya F; d) nī F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="6">
.<l n="a">ndā nāhan tikaṅ enakê kakanta</l>
780<l n="b">yan yogyâṅləganê manahta māsku</l>
.<l n="c">ndan ṣantabya matêki hayva cəṅga</l>
.<l n="d">jāti ṅvaṅ mavikalpa gəṅ viveka</l>
. <!--<app>a) nātan D; b) -âtəganê ABCDE.</app> -->
.
785</lg>
.<lg n="7">
.<l n="a">an maṅkā pva kakâhajəṅ vuvusta</l>
.<l n="b">oṃ oṃ lah sahaṅənta siṅ sayogya</l>
.<l n="c">ndah nāhan paṅucapnya karva somya</l>
790<l n="d">tovin tan hana ya vruhêṅ samaṅka</l>
. <!--<app>c) nohan C; d) ya ontbr. ABCDE.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="8">
795<l n="a">sampun pvâhayu denikâviveka</l>
.<l n="b">luṅhāṅ kāla səḍaṅ taḍah kamantyan</l>
.<l n="c">byātītan tinamuynya gātinika</l>
.<l n="d">sarvâtyanta haləpnikaṅ bhinukti</l>
. <!--<app>c) byaktītan A1B1D1E; niṅka AD, nīka E; gātənīkā F.</app> -->
800</lg>
.
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="10" met="kusumavilasita">
.
805<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">riṅ tadanantara pva ri huvusnyan amaṅan aṅinum yathāsukha</l>
.<l n="b">yatna ta kesarī muliha sampun ikin amuhun iṅ yayah bibi</l>
.<l n="c">prāpta nikîṅ dalem nagara somya dumunuṅ i narendraputrikā</l>
.<l n="d">marma giraṅ nirêriya sumāmbutakən ulih-ulihnya campaka</l>
810 <!--<app>a) rī CE; c) nikî CF; -nuṅ iṅ na- ABD; d) riya ontbr. F; sumambura taken C.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">ṅkān hana kāladeśanira tan hana marəki sirên samaṅkana</l>
815<l n="b">de ni vinit nira n pati vival dali-dalihan i riṅran in hati</l>
.<l n="c">nhih hiki Kesarī juga kasanmata samara nira tatan kasah</l>
.<l n="d">praya n ahop matan vruh i kirê kira-kira ri sakaptyan in tuhan
.</l> <!--<app>a) sirê sa- BC; b) vival dalihan C; c) ṅhiṅ iki AB2CD; kasatmata C.</app> -->
.
820</lg>
.<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">kālanirân hanêṅ gṛha kathañcana sira humucap tuvuhnira</l>
.<l n="b">himpər aśokapādapa sanāgakusuma səḍsəṅ iṅ labuh kapat</l>
.<l n="c">ndan viphalân hanêṅ nagara piṇḍa sukət alas arəs bhayênaka</l>
825<l n="d">riṅ kahanan hana vruha mənen amijilakəna harṣaniṅ rimaṅ</l>
. <!--<app>b) sabāga- B1; səḍəṅniṅ A; ri səḍəṅ iṅ F; d) rī AE (en B1?).</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="4">
830<l n="a">maṅkana rakva vastuni vuvusniṅ asəmu-səmu rāga gopita</l>
.<l n="b">ṅkā tika kesarī məḍarakən paṅutus ikaṅ ari priyambada</l>
.<l n="c">dyah lihatiki sambat i manəhta humatura ri masku sanmatan</l>
.<l n="d">tan tikəlā halis rari yadin salaha vacanani ṅhulun tuhan</l>
. <!--<app>a) maṅkāna A; b) peḍarakən C; iraṅ ABE; c) nyah A1; d) tuvan ABE.</app> -->
835
.</lg>
.<lg n="5">
.<l n="a">raśmini rūmnikaṅ kusuma campaka vinahəlakənta riṅ gəluṅ</l>
.<l n="b">rāmya sumāvəṅinya rari maṅkin amuvuhi laṅə̄nyane kita</l>
840<l n="c">ndan kadi saṅkriman tiki gatinya pəgata tika kiṅkiṅ iṅ maṅə̄</l>
.<l n="d">āptyakənê rarasta niyatanya humaləsana ri dyah i ṅhulun</l>
. <!--<app>a) nikā C; vinahilakənta C; b) laṅə̄ṅnyane A2; c) pəgatakita F;
. d) āmtyakənê ABE; antyakənê F; riṅ A1.</app> -->
.
845</lg>
.<lg n="6">
.<l n="a">ndan sira sah hatur səkasâṅajap aṅajuma saknikaṅ gəluṅ </l>
.<l n="b">saṅ vinuvus pravīra harimūrti ratu taruṇa katvaṅ iṅ sarāt</l>
.<l n="c">khyāti sirê priyambada manisnira maṅucap aron aluṅ laṅə̄ </l>
850<l n="d">saṅ subhagâjayêṅ raṇa litūhayu manulusa muṣṭiniṅ kavi</l>
. <!--<app>a) siraṅ B; -asaṅhajap A, asaṅajap BE; b) iṅ vuvus ABE; c) âñjayêṅ F, âjjayêṅ ABCE.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="7">
855<l n="a">ndan sira tַtâṅutus humatur aṅhyaṅa turunana sihta sanmatan</l>
.<l n="b">lvir səminiṅ tahən sira lume pinanasan i lulutnirê kita</l>
.<l n="c">tībra kakiṅkiṅan sira tuhun hudanana rari raśminiṅ guyu</l>
.<l n="d">rūmta manis mapiṇḍa madhumāsa divāsaṅ ariris tunêṅ vəlas</l>
. <!--<app>a) ahyaṅa C; sihka B; b) minanasan n C1, -nisan C2; d) hapiṇḍa C, tapiṇḍa F.</app> -->
860
.</lg>
.<lg n="8">
.<l n="a">len pva ya cihna simsimira kṛṣṇa pañələk iki mūlya tan sipi</l>
.<l n="b">təkvan ikiṅ sujīvita nirâmaratimaya maṇik ya bhāsvara</l>
865<l n="c">tan yatikîbu tumbasana kaprabhunira juga kagrahêṅ kita</l>
.<l n="d">mvaṅ sira rakva vastu hulunânəkana sakaharəpta liṅnira</l>
. <!--<app>a) pañəkiki B1; b) âmarātipaya A1, âmaratipaya B2; c) kaśrahêṅ F;
. d) hulunan kana sakaharəpanta AB2CE, -kaba- B1.</app> -->
.
870</lg>
.<lg n="9">
.<l n="a">yan hana śuddhi rakryan i sirâvəlasa ri panaṅisnirâṅrimaṅ</l>
.<l n="b">dūtaniraṅ priyambada ṅaranya rari maluya mājarê sira</l>
.<l n="c">hayva ta masku tan duga-dugân hana turunan i sihta riṅ maṅə̄</l>
875<l n="d">rapvan anīsa maṅkata kitâhañaṅa vijil i tambvaṅ iṅ vulan</l>
. <!--<app>b) ṅ ontbr. F; mājarêṅ A1B, mājarī A2; d) kita ABE; mijila A1BE, mijili A2; tambaṅ C.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="10">
880<l n="a">maṅkana liṅnikā ndan apiduhkha tiki sira narendraputrikā</l>
.<l n="b">heva miṅe sira dyah i mahârəṅu-rəṅu səmuniṅ mukhâmirah</l>
.<l n="c">ndān avədin katiṅhalana garjita karaṇaniran dadak vival</l>
.<l n="d">sotan apan hanâyam-ayaman lagi vinuninirê daləm hati</l>
. <!--<app>b) mukhammirah AB; c) tatiṅhalana F; daddak B.</app> -->
885
.</lg>
.<lg n="11">
.<l n="a">tattvanirêki ṅūni hana riṅ haripada kavəkas nirāśraya</l>
.<l n="b">deni lalis bhaṭāra layat aṅdadi ratu tan asih maṅaryakən</l>
890<l n="c">marmaniran mahânuturakən dadinira tiki rājaputrikā</l>
.<l n="d">ri hyunirâmaləs-maləsan elika ri hanani kūṅa saṅ prabhu</l>
. <!--<app>a) ri A1; c) dadi nara A2F; d) âṅmaləs- ABCDE; kuṅha AB.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
895<lg n="12">
.<l n="a">ndah yatikā nimittaniran eñjuh apicala tikəl halisnira</l>
.<l n="b">lvir tuhu denirâbvat i manah rasa tan uvah i somyaniṅ hati</l>
.<l n="c">rī vəkasan mijil sira tuhun saṅ aṅucap ikiṅ āri keraṅan</l>
.<l n="d">tovi turuṅ tulus raras ikaṅ vacana viphala tan rinəṅvakən</l>
900 <!--<app>a) nimīta CE, nimiṅta B1; c) âbvan ABE; uvar C1; c) riṅ F; aṅri C; d) vilapa A1BC2E; rinəṅyakən C.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="13">
.<l n="a">suṅsutira pva ṅūni lagi tan vənaṅ inimur-imur gəgət sərəh</l>
905<l n="b">məṅgəp acum kuraṅ vuvus i len i vuyuṅira yayâpuput pati</l>
.<l n="c">kāraṇa kesarī kapənətan kadi kaluputan epu riṅ gati</l>
.<l n="d">mogha salah tahâṅaṅən-aṅən kadi-kadi rasaniṅ praṅən məne</l>
. <!--<app>b) pəṅgəp A1; d) pəne A1.</app> -->
.
910</lg>
.<lg n="14">
.<l n="a">ambəkira pva dhīra ri panūtən i manahira māri suṅkava</l>
.<l n="b">mon tuhu tan hanaṅ turidamātra ri hatinira tan ya saṅśayan</l>
.<l n="c">təkvan ikaṅ vilāpa hana nirvigatinika turuṅ təkê kita</l>
915<l n="d">marmanirâkirê sakaraṇanya vacanənira paṅgilâpriya</l>
. <!--<app>a) panuhən B2, patən B1; b) saṅsaya ABE; c) vilāsa A1BC (E onduid.); d) haṅgilâ B.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="15">
920<l n="a">vvantən ulihnirâkira-kirâhayu sumilib anūkṣma tan kara</l>
.<l n="b">raṇḍi malar kasaṅ-kasaṅ i pahyasanira sumaji tahas kuniṅ</l>
.<l n="c">ṅkāna tikaṅ vilāpa sinuvəṅ kinəkəsaṅ i daləm ginopita</l>
.<l n="d">kālanirâhyas arja niyatanyan arəs i sira kevalâdara</l>
. <!--<app>b. patyasan A1B1C1E; sumajîṅ B; tuniṅ C, kunəṅ F; c) tika B; dalə A1.</app> -->
925
.</lg>
.<lg n="16">
.<l n="a">sampun areh mijil ta rasikâsəmu sumar i vuyuṅnirê hati</l>
.<l n="b">yatna dumeh si kesari humer valuyani sihirā sinevaka</l>
930<l n="c">tan vuvusən gatinya kalaluṅ divasa ri huvus iṅ ḍavuh pitu</l>
.<l n="d">somya tibāṅ laluṅ masanirâhavu-havu marikâ samaṅkana</l>
. <!--<app>a) âsəmu-səmu ri F; b) sakē sira F; sa ABCE; irân F; c) vusə̄n A1B1C, tabəh ABE; d) tikaṅ ABCE, tibā F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
935<lg n="17">
.<l n="a">tan dva sirâdan ahyasa tuvī sumaji sahananiṅ səkar miṅiṅ</l>
.<l n="b">yatna marək ta saṅ kaka-kakâṅharəpakən atatā yathākrama</l>
.<l n="c">ndah ri səḍəṅnirâhyas aṅalap crəmin inunusirêṅ kasaṅ-kasaṅ</l>
.<l n="d">ṅkā tumibāṅ vilāpa ri harəpnira kadi-kadi sasmitâṅliṅa</l>
940 <!--<app>a) ayasa A1B1E; b) marək ka B1; kaka-kana AB1CE.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="18">
.<l n="a">manna lihatnirêriya tuhun vətuni manira hārdha saṅśaya</l>
945<l n="b">āpan abhāva dāṅunidaṅū sari-sari nora maṅkana</l>
.<l n="c">vruh yan upāya saṅ kaka nimittaniran asəmu harṣaniṅ mulat</l>
.<l n="d">tan kagilaṅ-gilaṅ nda tumuluy vinacanira kinubdha tan humūṅ</l>
. <!--<app>b) abhāva daṅūni daṅūni daṅū sari2 sira nora A1, abhāvapā daṅū etc.
. A2, abhāvapā daṅuni daṅū A2; nuniṅ F; sari-sarira C1; c) hasəmu F; d) -gilaṅ tumuluyā vi- C1.</app> -->
950</lg>
.
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="11" met="jagaddhita">
.
955<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">ḍuh saṅ hyaṅ-hyaṅ i rāmyaniṅ masa kapat piturun i leṅeṅ iṅ pasir vukir</l>
.<l n="b">saṅ muṅgv iṅ hatiniṅ maṅə̄ saṅ inamər tinulisakən i patraniṅ puḍak </l>
.<l n="c">saṅ sākṣāt makamūrti luhniṅ aṅaraṅ saṅ amasi laraniṅ smarātura</l>
.<l n="d">saṅ sāhitya kinonaṅ ānuṅ agave panaṅisaniṅ anūtakən lulut</l>
960 <!--<app>a) saṅ hyaṅi A1 F; d) manaṅisa AB1CE; anūthakən (t-h) AB1, anūttakən C.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">paṅhyaṅniṅ kəna rāga vastu huniṅan tuhun ana vara sihta sanmatan</l>
965<l n="b">saṅsārânahəniṅ prih iṅ hṛdaya mūrchita linaran i śaktiniṅ smara</l>
.<l n="c">mantaṅ māti kakiṅkiṅan karakət iṅ turida bəsur aṅə̄lakən laṅə̄ </l>
.<l n="d">nityâṅanti rarabni luhta yatikâmṛta sira pakənê tvas i ṅhulun</l>
. <!--<app>c) aṅə̄lvakən CE; d) makənê F.</app> -->
.
970</lg>
.<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">yan kevantəna tan hanâta vəlasanta riṅ aṅajapi rūmta kāsihan</l>
.<l n="b">denyânūt pakahan hunaṅku rari sanmata masira rarashalūlakən</l>
.<l n="c">mon yan dadya virāga muṅgva ri gəluṅ maṅəmita vaṅiniṅ vahəl mənur</l>
975<l n="d">astām yan vipathâpa rāmyanikin āpti liriṅ i mata saṅkaniṅ taṅis</l>
. <!--<app>b) yakahan A1; halulakən A1, halinlakən[?] A2, rarasta lūlakən CF;
. c) hadya ABE, kadya C; maṅəmihati rum iṅ ABC2E, -mihatvaṅiniṅ C1.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
980
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="12" met="kusumavilasita">
.
.<lg n="1">
985<l n="a">nāhan ikaṅ vilāpa tumanə̄m i hatinira narendraputrikā</l>
.<l n="b">yeka liṅe harūm muhara līla sira lumuru citta vah laṅə̄</l>
.<l n="c">maṅgəh asambhavāśan apanas tvasira ri dilah iṅ smarānala</l>
.<l n="d">maṅkin atis kunəṅ rəsəp apan lagi siniram i hisni luhnira</l>
. <!--<app>a) ri F; b) harûmuhara A1BE; c) kasam- F; d) maṅkiṅ A.</app> -->
990
.</lg>
.<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">ndan vara kesarī tiki hanâṅiṅətakən aṅənəs ndatan katon</l>
.<l n="b">tan katəṅər mahā mahaliṅan saka lumiriṅ aliṇḍuṅan taviṅ</l>
995<l n="c">vruh ri manahniran katuridan kinəkəs iṅ ati tan vināhyakən</l>
.<l n="d">mogha pinet kinārya kinalīṅana vinuni kasəṅgu-səṅguhan</l>
. <!--<app>d) kinaliṅhana ABE, kinalīṅa vinuni kadi səṅguhan C1; C2 id. maar səṅgu iṅgevoegd; kinaliṅhanaṅ vinuni kadi səṅgu-səṅguhan F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
1000<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">rī vəkasan təkaṅ vəṅi ləpas hyaṅ aruṇa kapaṅulvan iṅ vukir</l>
.<l n="b">himpər arāryan iṅ gəgər anolih i saṅ aṅaraṅ epu riṅ gati</l>
.<l n="c">vetni vəlasniran hali-halin ta kunaṅ i lara saṅ katiṅgala</l>
.<l n="d">mātra suməṅ sənə̄nira katon kadi lumiriṅ anaṅya-naṅyakən</l>
1005 <!--<app>a) təkā C; b) riṅ hati F; c) niraṅ hali2n C.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="4">
.<l n="a">rep rumahab tikaṅ pətəṅ avaśya vijil i hati saṅ nṛpātmaja</l>
1010<l n="b">śīrṇa kagunturan paməvəh iṅ turida kaḍəḍətan raras hati</l>
.<l n="c">yan tan ikā pilih təmahan iṅ vacanarasa vilāpa riṅ tatur</l>
.<l n="d">donya marā sirā maṅən-aṅən savəkasan ika medi riṅ rimaṅ</l>
. <!--<app>d) marāsikâ F; savəkasa rika C; meddhi ABE; rī A2.</app> -->
.
1015</lg>
.<lg n="5">
.<l n="a">ndāh irikan mulih sira ri pamrəmanira sakuləm taman kəjəp</l>
.<l n="b">glāna məhāh sirâkusikan epuh iṅ ulaha sumuṅkəm iṅ tilam</l>
.<l n="c">tan sipi tisnikaṅ hima sumandan i sira dumadak təkâpanas</l>
1020<l n="d">sampayirên smara nda sumarik ri sira sahana mogha maṅlare</l>
. <!--<app>b) emuh C1: d) sampuy ABE; rasa rasa hana C.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
.</div>
1025<div type="canto" n="13" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita">
.
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">luṅhȧn kāla təṅah kuləm səḍəṅ akəg nidrā vvaṅ iṅ jro kabeh</l>
.<l n="b">norâtaṅhi salah sikinya paḍa mūrchā tībra deniṅ harip</l>
1030<l n="c">mvaṅ ceṭi bilalâturū paḍa lukar siñjaṅnya norâṅhavər</l>
.<l n="d">lvir papraṅ vanitā pva dṛvyanikahən kāry añjəlag kesisan</l>
. <!--<app>a) ṅ ontbr. C; aken ABE; c) kaḍalakar AB1EF; kapa lukar B2, kadalaka
. C; d) mapraṅ C.</app> -->
.
1035</lg>
.<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">saṅ hyaṅ sītakarâlaṅə̄ vahu mijil tumraṅ suməṅ riṅ laṅit</l>
.<l n="b">lvir heñjuh masaput-saput limut asoṅsoṅ megha rāgah nipis</l>
.<l n="c">eraṅ ganya siran tumona mukhaniṅ strīṅ kāriṅ antahpurā</l>
1040<l n="d">sugy ataṅya hiḍəpnirêriya mataṅnyâliṇḍuṅan parvata</l>
. <!--<app>b) -reñjuli C; c) ṅ ontbr. AB; -purī ABE.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="3">
1045<l n="a">saṅṣiptan sira saṅśayâruhur avas tan kāvarā(n) nīrada</l>
.<l n="b">sākṣāt hrū hyaṅ anaṅga bhāsvara mahâhyun matyanaṅ vvaṅ laṅə̄</l>
.<l n="c">trus kavrâlaradan tikaṅ pətəṅ arəs luṅhâṅumət riṅ gihā</l>
.<l n="d">len prāptâhakin i vvaṅ amrəm atəmah svapnâmaṅun lālana</l>
. <!--<app>b) niatya vvaṅ nān A1BE, vaṅ alaṅə̄ C, matyana vvaṅ F; c) tras aA1B1; havrā F,
1050 lārâlaradan ABE; d) âlakin A2; iṅ CF.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="4">
.<l n="a">maṅkin rāmya tikaṅ pradeśa kadi sə̄k harṣan kasəṅvaṅ vulan</l>
1055<l n="b">akrab-krab hima taṅ tahən saha kucupnyâṅras asuṅsuṅ guyu</l>
.<l n="c">oṅsil kadya girahyasən ləməs i sinvamnyâṅəḍal kāṅinan</l>
.<l n="d">mraknyânavvaṅ i pasyaṅ iṅ tuhu-tuhu sinraṅnikaṅ caṅkiluṅ</l>
. <!--<app>a) harṣā ABCE; b) ti A2, tiṅ A3, saka ABE; c) girāyasən AB1E; akədal F;
. d) ikaṅ AB.</app> -->
1060
.</lg>
.<lg n="5">
.<l n="a">parṇah lor akətər patərnya dinulurniṅ varṣa tan karkaśa</l>
.<l n="b">tapvan byakta kilatnya mātra lumarap sākṣāt kəḍapniṅ rəməṅ</l>
1065<l n="c">kadyânaṅhi rimaṅ tumiṅhalana paṅjrahniṅ səkar kābunan</l>
.<l n="d">rapvan bhrānta mapâmbəkanya kalaṅə̄ mūrchân panaṇḍaṅ karas</l>
. <!--<app>a) dinulū c; c) ânāṅi ABE.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
1070<lg n="6">
.<l n="a">tan ryamban tiki kesarī ləṅəvn aṅunṅan rī vijilniṅ vulan</l>
.<l n="b">śokāśā ri vuyuṅ narendraduhitā tovi pva yā tan liniṅ</l>
.<l n="c">hetunyâməṅ-aməṅ mahâṅlipu-lipur ndā tan panambaṅ lara</l>
.<l n="d">maṅkin śīrṇa rəmək hatinya dadi luh tan pântarâṅher-tali</l>
1075 <!--<app>a) riṅ F; vijīl i C; natar i.p.v. vulan F; b) śokārṣā F; liṅniṅ A1B1E;
. c) etunyâ AB.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="7">
1080<l n="a">ri vvitniṅ taru pārijāta rasikin glānânaṅis tan humuṅ</l>
.<l n="b">asrət mâr ahirit svaranya səsəgən haṅrəs-ṅrəs amlad hati</l>
.<l n="c">sambatnyā suməsəl svakarmaniki tan vruh rī pəh iṅ sevaka</l>
.<l n="d">nāhan hetunikâmuvus layat amūr aṅdoha sākêṅ sabhā</l>
. <!--<app>a) ravvat B, ravit E; ragiki A1BE; b) abrəs- B1;
1085 c) vrivəh A1BE, vrivəh A2, rī pəh C; d) layak A1, layakt- B; sankêṅ F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="8">
.<l n="a">ndan devī sira tâṅlilir kadi tinaṅhinyan təñuh tvasnira</l>
1090<l n="b">suṅsut-suṅsutira pva yan tuhu-tuhun moghâharəp riṅ taṅis</l>
.<l n="c">saṃsārāniṅ akuṅ rimaṅ-rimaṅaniṅ bhrāntâriraṅ donira</l>
.<l n="d">nāhan taṅ vvaṅ arājasâgələm amet rañcāniṅ aṅgə̄h unaṅ</l>
. <!--<app>a) aṅlilar A1B1E; tvasira A1BCE; b) 1x suṅsut ontbr. C1; moghā 1. polah C;
. c) âriṅraṅ C, rimaṅ-maṅa F; d) aṅgaṅ A1B1E.</app> -->
1095
.</lg>
.<lg n="9">
.<l n="a">maṅke pvā kaka kesarī kavaśa deniṅ bheda duhkhaṅ smara</l>
.<l n="b">ndā tan yogya matêki tan hari-hariṅ puṅgəl pisan taṅ laṅə̄</l>
1100<l n="c">nāhan marmaniran mijil gəyuh anambyâṅdāni siñjaṅ lukar</l>
.<l n="d">tan kevə̄ lukar iṅ gəluṅ saha səkarnyâvrā tibā tūt havan</l>
. <!--<app>b) makêki AE, maṅkêki B; c) niraṅ mijil C; anambyāddhāni ABCEF;
. d) tibrā C1.</app> -->
.
1105</lg>
.<lg n="10">
.<l n="a">eñjuh prāptanirâkisapvan umusap luh saṅ vimūrchânaṅis</l>
.<l n="b">ayvāsah kaka riṅ kapāna vənaṅaṅkvâdoha saṅkê kita</l>
.<l n="c">ndan prih rakṣa tuvuhku ton iṅ asanâṅluṅ vāhu kambvan patər</l>
1110<l n="d">eman rūmni sariṅya tapvan anəḍəṅ mūrchā kənêṅ ṣaṭpada</l>
. <!--<app>a) nirêki- A2, nirân ki- F; b) kaka ririṅ B; sakêṅ C;
. d) heman c; tapvak A1B1CEF.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
1115<lg n="11">
.<l n="a">nāhan liānira riṅ sāmantara sirâsyaṅ mañjiṅê jro puri</l>
.<l n="b">enak rī vəkasan manah rasiki saṅ nityānireṅ kuṅnira</l>
.<l n="c">olih rakva savuṅ tənuṅnya pəjahan tan vətva kiṅkiṅnira</l>
.<l n="d">maṅke ndin luputaṅ virāga ri gəluṅ rūmrūmnikaṅ kesarī</l>
1120 <!--<app>a) -êṅ jro CF; b) riṅ CF; d) luputā vi- C; nikā CF.</app> -->
.</lg>
.
.</div>
.<div type="canto" n="14" met="mālinī">
1125
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">avicarita ri sampunyân liniṅ de suputrī</l>
.<l n="b">rahina vəṅi tan imbā lālanâriṅ halolya</l>
.<l n="c">hanan aṅulih-ulih śṛṅgāra sojarnya siṇḍyan</l>
1130<l n="d">saha guyu midəm aṅde rañca tasvā rinəṅvan</l>
. <!--<app>1. a) avicaritan i C; sampunyā F; liṅniṅ BE; b) han C2; raṅal- C1, riṅa-C2;
. d) nasvā F.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
1135<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">tuvi siliṅ iriṅ ambək rakva ya mvaṅ suputrī</l>
.<l n="b">səmu-səmunira konaṅ kavruhan vruh mapaṅgil</l>
.<l n="c">hinənəṅakən acumbv¶aliṅ liniṅ mogha cəṅga</l>
.<l n="d">turida valəsana pyah kuṅnirêvəh tinūtnya</l>
1140 <!--<app>b) vrū F; c) rinəṅənakən ABCE; liṅniṅ B; d) pyəh C.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">pira ta lavasirâməm harṣa rūmembya rūmnya</l>
1145<l n="b">nda tucapana ta dūtā nāradâtyanta duṣṭa</l>
.<l n="c">ḍatəṅ avara-varah riṅ śrī jarāndharāja</l>
.<l n="d">ri gati bhupati kṛṣṇân pakṣa bhaṅgā ri devī</l>
. <!--<app>a) karṣa hūmembya C; b) atanta a1; -tanadūtā F; c) avarah-varah F.</app> -->
.
1150</lg>
.<lg n="4">
.<l n="a">vuvusira madhurârūm he jarāsandha nātha</l>
.<l n="b">ṅhulun alavas akiṅkiṅ hetuniṅ prāpta maṅke</l>
.<l n="c">tuvi kasəpə-səpər ṅvaṅ lālanâlīla-līla</l>
1155<l n="d">para ratu pira hiṅ deśâhasâsiṅ kavanva</l>
. <!--<app>b) hulun C.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="5">
1160<l n="a">irika kami kapūhan maṅrəṅə̄ kāstavanta</l>
.<l n="b">para ratu paḍa matvaṅ kapva bhaktī manuṅkul</l>
.<l n="c">kunəṅ iki hana tuṅgal tan paḍə̄m iṅ kamānan</l>
.<l n="d">tan avədi ri kitâṅhiṅ kṛṣṇa lagy aṅgakāra</l>
. <!--<app>a) manrəṅā B1; c) padəm AB; i A1C, riṅ F.</app> -->
1165
.</lg>
.<lg n="6">
.<l n="a">tuvi hana vacananyâtyanta riṅ tan payukti</l>
.<l n="b">ndan umalapa ri devī rukmiṇī madhya rātri</l>
1170<l n="c">kita mara śaraṇā śrī bhīṣmakâsiṅ sakārya</l>
.<l n="d">ndatan avədi ri nāthâpan kədə̄ tan panaṅgəl</l>
. <!--<app>a) sayukti; d) panaṅgal A1.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
1175<lg n="7">
.<l n="a">na vuvusira mahārṣi kveh muvah tan vivākṣaṅ</l>
.<l n="b">aṅurub-urubi səṅhit saṅ narendrârdha muntab</l>
.<l n="c">ry ulihira ta ri duhkha śrī Jarāsandha śoka</l>
.<l n="d">savəṅi-savəṅi maṅkin kepvan iṅ dāya yogya</l>
1180 <!--<app>b) âddha B1; d) 1x savəṅi ontbr. A1.</app> -->
.
.</lg>
.<lg n="8">
.<l n="a">karaṇaniran umuṇḍaṅ bhīṣmakâkon pravīra</l>
1185<l n="b">avicarita kadon iṅ pāntarā tan vivākṣaṅ</l>
.<l n="c">təka vəkasan anaṅkil saṅ hinuṇḍaṅ prayatna</l>
.<l n="d">vinuvusanira somyan ṅkāna riṅ śūnya rāmya</l>

.
1190</lg>
.<lg n="9">
.<l n="a">haji nihan iki don i ṅvaṅ humuṇḍaṅ narārya</l>
.<l n="b">hana sira viku saṅkêṅ svarga və̄ṅin para ṅke</l>
.<l n="c">ṅaranira ta mahārṣi nāradâkhyāti riṅ rat</l>

.
.</lg>
1200<lg n="10">
.<l n="a">ndan ika hana musuh śrī kṛṣṇa corapracāra</l>
.<l n="b">ḍatəṅ aṅalapa putriṅtêṅ kuləm rakva donya</l>

.<lg n="11">
.<l n="a">ndan ikin aṅənanê tvastâpa yañ cedirāja</l>
1210<l n="b">panarimana ri putrīntârəṇah tovi śakti</l>
.<l n="c">ndan apa karika mānahtêkihən dāna kanyā</l>

1215</lg>
.<lg n="12">
.<l n="a">prabhu mapa karikânuṅ līṅa sājña narendra</l>
.<l n="b">hulunakəna jugê kūṅ nīti maṅgəh rasanya</l>

1225<lg n="13">
.<l n="a">nahan ujarira kālih somya sampun paḍâtūt</l>
.<l n="b">rikan umuhun umantuk bhīṣmakâṅdāni kārya</l>
.<l n="c">nṛpati ri karavīra śrī Jarāsandha rakva</l>

.<div type="canto" n="15" met="indravajrā">
1235
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">luṅhā maraṅ kāla huvus mavəṅyan</l>
.<l n="b">saṅ śrī Jarāsandha siraṅ prayatna</l>
.<l n="c">ṅūnin humuṇḍaṅ naranātha cedya</l>
1240<l n="d">maṅken təkânambah i jəṅnirâtvaṅ</l>

.<lg n="2">
1245<l n="a">ṅkā saṅ narendrân paṅucap ri cedya</l>

.<l n="c">dyah rukmiṇī bhīṣmakarājaputrī</l>

1250

.<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">tovin ṅhulun hayvana sārabhūta</l>
.<l n="b">maṅken amidhyāna vivāhakārya</l>
1255<l n="c">sakvehnikaṅ bhūpati riṅ pradeśa</l>

1260<lg n="4">

1300<lg n="9">
